trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire adult kruthik takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The kruthik has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kruthik's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

trait.name: Tunneler
entries: The kruthik can burrow through solid rock at half its burrowing speed and leaves a 2 1/2-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

trait.name: Gnashing Horde
entries: Any creature other than a kruthic that starts its turn adjacent to one or more kruthiks takes 5 (1d4 + 3) per adjacent kruthik.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The kruthik makes two stab attacks or two spike attacks.

action.name: Stab
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d8 + 3) piercing damage.

action.name: Spike
entries: Ranged Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage and 18 (3d10 + 3) poison damage and the target's movement speed is halved until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Tail
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 25 (5d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire aegisaur takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire aerosaur takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Dive Attack
entries: If the aerosaur is flying and dives at least 30 feet toward a target and then hits with a bite attack, the attack deals an extra 10 () damage to the target.

trait.name: Flyby
entries: The aerosaur doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. Hit: 19 (4d8 + 3) piercing damage.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire young aerosaur takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Flyby
entries: The aerosaur doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (3d6 + 2) piercing damage

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire allosaurus takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Pounce
entries: If the allosaurus moves at least 30 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the allosaurus can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 23 (3d12 + 5) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 5) slashing damage.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire amphisbaena takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Two Heads
entries: The amphisbaena has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks and on saving throws against being blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, and knocked unconscious.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The amphisbaena makes two bite attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw, taking 19 (3d10 + 4) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire ankylosaurus takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Scute Armor
entries: Creatures cannot benefit from flanking the ankylosaurus unless it is prone.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ankylosaurus makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its tail club. It can't make both attacks against the same target.

action.name: Beak
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (4d8 + 5) piercing damage. This attack deals an additional 23 (3d12 + 5) piercing damage to a prone creature.

action.name: Tail Club
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 35 (6d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage, the target is pushed 10 feet away, and the target must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or be knocked prone. A Large or larger creature that fails this save by 5 or more is unable to stand until it completes a short or long rest.

reaction.name: Flatten
entries: As a reaction to taking 10 or more damage from a single source, the ankylosaurus presses its body to the ground, protecting its soft underbelly. Until the beginning of its next turn, the Anklyosaurus adds 3 to its AC.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire ape takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Reckless
entries: At the start of its turn, the ape can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls it makes during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Juggernaut Leap
entries: The ape's long jump is up to 30 feet and its high jump is up to 20 feet when it has a running start. If the ape jumps at least 20 feet, it may land in the space of any medium or smaller creature. The creature must succeed on a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw or be knocked prone. On a successful save, is instead pushed 5 feet out of the ape's space into an unoccupied space of the creature's choice.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ape makes two fist attacks.

action.name: Fist
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage. This attack deals an additional 29 (5d10 + 4) damage to a grappled creature.

action.name: Rock
entries: Ranged Weapon Attack. +6 to hit, reach 25/50 ft., one target. Hit: (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The gorilla makes two fist attacks.

action.name: Fist
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 20 (3d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Rock
entries: Ranged Weapon Attack. +7 to hit, range 25/50 ft., one target. Hit: 25 (5d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

bonus.name: Chest Pound (1/Day)
entries: The gorilla frantically beats its chest are roars.  Every creature, expect those the gorilla is friendly to, within 30 feet that can see or hear it must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened of the gorilla until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire gorilla takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

action.name: Tail
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 34 (7d8 + 6) piercing damage.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire armasaur takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire assassin bug takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The assassin bug has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The assassin bug makes two bite attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 14 (2d12 + 2) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute. While poisoned this way, the target is paralyzed. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Ovipositor
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: The target is infested with assassin bug eggs, which immediately hatch into assassin bug maggots. At the start of each of the target's turns, the target takes piercing damage per maggot infesting it. Applying fire to the bite wound before the end of the target's next turn deals 1 fire damage to the target and kills these assassin bug maggots. After this time, the maggots are too far under the skin to be burned.

If a target infested by assassin bug maggots ends its turn with 0 hit points, it dies as the maggots burrow into its heart and kill it. Any effect that cures disease kills all assassin bug maggots infesting the target.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire aurochs takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Stampede
entries: When the aurochs moves, each adjacent aurochs may use its reaction to move with it. If one or more aurochs do so, the aurochs has advantage on attack rolls this turn.

trait.name: Trampling Charge
entries: If the aurochs moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the aurochs can make one attack with its hooves against it as a bonus action.

trait.name: Reckless Follow-Through
entries: At the start of its turn, the aurochs can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls during that turn. If it misses with an attack this turn, it is stunned until the beginning of its next turn.

action.name: Gore
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 18 (2d12 + 6) piercing damage.

action.name: Hooves
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (2d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire aurumvorax takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Treasure Sense
entries: The aurumvorax can pinpoint, by scent, the location of precious metals and stones, such as coins and gems, within 60 ft. of it.

trait.name: Ornery
entries: The aurumvorax does not die or fall unconscious due to dropping to 0 HP if it was attacked by a hostile creature since the end of its previous turn. If the badger starts its turn with 0 HP without having been attacked since the end of its previous turn, it dies.

trait.name: Incredible Density
entries: The aurumvorax has advantage on attempts to shove creatures, and on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would shove it or knock it prone. The aurumvorax may grapple or shove creatures up to three sizes larger than it.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The aurumvorax makes five attacks: one with its locking jaws and four with its scrabbling claws. It may replace any of its claw attacks with a Shove attempt.

action.name: Locking Jaws
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (3d8 + 5) piercing damage and the target is grappled. Until this grapple ends, the aurumvorax can bite only the grappled creature and has advantage on attack rolls to do so.

action.name: Scrabbling Claws
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (3d6 + 5) piercing damage. If this attack is made at advantage, it does an additional 17 (3d8 + 5) damage.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire axe beak takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The axe beak has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the axe beak's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

trait.name: Burst of Speed (Recharge 6)
entries: The axe beak may dash as a bonus action.

action.name: Beak
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d10 + 3) slashing damage. This attack deals an additional 21 (3d12 + 3) damage to a prone target.

action.name: Kick
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (3d8 + 3) piercing damage. On a critical hit, the target is knocked prone.

trait.name: Reckless

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The baboon has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the baboon's allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

trait.name: Juggernaut Leap
entries: The baboon's long jump is up to 30 feet and its high jump is up to 20 feet when it has a running start. If the baboon jumps at least 20 feet, it may land in the space of any medium or smaller creature. The creature must succeed on a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw or be knocked prone. On a successful save, is instead pushed 5 feet out of the baboon's space into an unoccupied space of the creature's choice.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (3d10 + 2) piercing damage.

action.name: Screeching Bark
entries: Each creature within 100 ft. that can hear, but not see the baboon must make a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened for the next minute. A creature may repeat this save at the end of its turn, ending the effect on a success.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire baloth takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Trampling Charge
entries: If the baloth moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 18 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the baloth can make one stomp attack against it as a bonus action.

action.name: Gore
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 32 (5d10 + 7) piercing damage.

action.name: Stomp
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one prone creature. Hit: 31 (4d12 + 7) bludgeoning damage

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire bat takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Keen Hearing
entries: The bat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. 0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2).

action.name: Echolocation
entries: If the bat is not deafened, it gains one of the following benefits until the end of its next turn:

items.name: Low Frequency
entries: The bat gains Blindsight to a range of 60 feet.

items.name: High Frequency
entries: The bat has advantage on melee attack rolls. Whenever the bat uses its Chaotic Swerve and the triggering attack misses it, the bat regains its reaction.

reaction.name: Chaotic Swerve
entries: As a reaction when the bat is targeted with an attack, it may move 5 feet directly toward the nearest creature and impose disadvantage on the attack roll.
Then, if one or more creatures are within 5 feet of it, the bat must succeed on a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw or fall prone.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire black bear takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The bear has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Concussive Strength
entries: A creature knocked prone by the bear must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be unable to stand on its following turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The bear makes two claw attacks. If both attacks hit the same medium or smaller creature, it is knocked prone.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d8 + 3) piercing damage. This attack does an additional 23 (4d10 + 3) damage to a prone creature.

action.name: Claws
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.

action.name: Blustery Charge (Recharge 6)
entries: The bear moves up to its speed towards a creature. Each creature within 5 ft. of where it ends this movement must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of the bear's next turn.
If no creature fails this save, the bear is frightened of each creature that passed it until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire blood hawk takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Keen Sight
entries: The hawk has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Air Superiority
entries: If the hawk descended at least 60 ft. this turn, it may Dash or Disengage as a Bonus Action.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hawk makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its talons.

action.name: Beak
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage.

action.name: Talons
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage. If the target is Small or smaller, it is grappled and (escape DC 14).

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire boar takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Earth Scenting
entries: The boar has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell. It can sense the type, number, and direction of underground plants and animals within 25 ft. of it.

trait.name: Ploughing Charge
entries: If the boar moves at least 20 ft. in a straight line, it may move through the space of any Medium or smaller creature.
When the boar enters a creature's space, the creature must succeed on a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw or be knocked prone, or move to the nearest unoccupied space on a success.

action.name: Tusks
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d8 + 2) slashing damage. A prone creature takes an additional 17 (3d10 + 2) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Foaming Defiance
entries: As a reaction to taking damage that would reduce it to 0 hit points, the boar makes a DC 12 Constitution saving throw. On a success, the boar is instead reduced to 1 hit point.
If triggered by piercing damage or a critical hit, this saving throw is made at disadvantage.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire bone whelk takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Adhesive
entries: The bone whelk can cause Medium or smaller objects to adhere to it. A Medium or smaller creature that touches the bone whelk is grappled by it (escape DC 11).

trait.name: Death Scream
entries: When the bone whelk dies, it emits a blood-curdling shriek than can be heard out to a range of 120 feet. This shriek causes nonmagical, organic material within 10 feet of the bone whelk to rot. Each creature within 10 feet of the bone whelk when it dies takes 25 (4d12 + 1) necrotic damage.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The bone whelk can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 19 (3d12 + 1) piercing damage.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire bristled moorbounder takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Bladed Hide
entries: At the start of each of its turns, the moorbounder deals 21 (4d8 + 5) piercing damage to any creature grappling it.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: The moorbounder's long jump is up to 40 feet and its high jump is up to 20 feet, with or without a running start.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The moorbounder makes two attacks: one with its blades and one with its claws.

action.name: Blades
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (3d8 + 5) slashing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 20 (5d6 + 5) slashing damage.

action.name: Stomp
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +9 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: 36 (6d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 17 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

action.name: Tail
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +9 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: 41 (7d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire brontodon takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire brontosaurus takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Thunderous Stride
entries: If the brontosaurus moves on its turn, the ground within 10 feet of it becomes difficult terrain for all other creatures until the beginning of its next turn.

trait.name: Implacable
entries: If the brontosaurus fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead. If it does, it loses 25 hit points.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The brontosaurus attacks twice with its stomp, one of which it may replace with a use of its Tail Sweep, if available.

action.name: Stomp
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 27 (4d10 + 7) bludgeoning damage. This attack deals an additional 31 (4d12 + 7) bludgeoning damage to a prone creature.

action.name: Tail Sweep (Recharge 5-6)
entries: Each creature in a 20 ft. cone must succeed on a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw or take 47 (8d10 + 7) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone, or half as much on a success.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire brown bear takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Concussive Strength
entries: A creature knocked prone by the bear must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or be unable to stand on its following turn.

trait.name: Rear Up
entries: The bear may use 30 ft. of its movement to stand upright until the end of its turn. While standing, the bear has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks and attacks made with its claws, and cannot attack with its bite.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The bear makes two claw attacks. If both attacks hit the same medium or smaller creature, it is knocked prone.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (3d8 + 5) piercing damage. This attack does an additional 25 (4d10 + 5) damage to a prone creature.

action.name: Claws
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 5) slashing damage.

action.name: Bluff Charge (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The bear moves up to its speed towards a creature. Each creature within 10 ft. of where it ends this movement must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of the bear's next turn.
If no creature fails this save, the bear may make a claw attack against a creature in range as part of this action.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire bulette takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: The bulette's long jump is up to 30 feet and its high jump is up to 15 feet, with or without a running start.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 40 (5d12 + 5) piercing damage.

action.name: Deadly Leap
entries: If the bulette jumps at least 15 feet as part of its movement, it can then use this action to land on its feet in a space that contains one or more other creatures. Each of those creatures must succeed on a DC 16 Strength or Dexterity saving throw (target's choice) or be knocked prone and take 21 (4d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage plus 21 (4d8 + 5) slashing damage. On a successful save, the creature takes only half the damage, isn't knocked prone, and is pushed 5 feet out of the bulette's space into an unoccupied space of the creature's choice. If no unoccupied space is within range, the creature instead falls prone in the bulette's space.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (3d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire camel takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire carrion crawler takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The carrion crawler has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The carrion crawler can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Consume
entries: If the carrion crawler has a creature grappled, the carrion crawler can make a predigest attack as a bonus action.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The carrion crawler makes two attacks with its tentacles.

action.name: Tentacles
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 3) poison damage, the target is grappled (escape DC 13). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the carrion crawler can't use its tentacles against another target.

action.name: Predigest
entries: One grappled creature must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute. While poisoned in this way, attackers score a critical hit against the poisoned creature on a roll of 11-20. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the poison on itself on a success.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (3d6 + 3) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Bite Down
entries: As a reaction to being hit with an attack by a creature it does not have grappled, the carrion crawler makes a bite attack against a creature it has grappled.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The carrion stalker makes three Tentacle attacks. If it is attached to a creature, it can replace one Tentacle attack with Larval Burst, if available.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage, and the carrion stalker attaches to the target and pulls itself into the target's space. While attached, the carrion stalker moves with the target and has advantage on attack rolls against it.

A creature can use its action to try to detach the carrion stalker and force it to move into the nearest unoccupied space, doing so with a successful DC 14 Strength check. On its turn, the carrion stalker can detach itself from the target by using 5 feet of movement. When it dies, the carrion stalker detaches from any creature it is attached to.

action.name: Larval Burst (1/Day)
entries: The carrion stalker releases a burst of larvae in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on itself. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned. A creature poisoned in this way takes 23 (4d10 + 3) poison damage at the start of each of its turns as larvae infest its body. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. Any effect that cures disease or removes the poisoned condition instantly kills the larvae in the creature, ending the effect on it.

If a creature is reduced to 0 hit points by the infestation, it dies. The larvae remain in the corpse, and one survives to become a fully grown carrion stalker in  weeks. Any effect that cures diseases or removes the poisoned condition that targets the corpse instantly kills the larvae.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire carrion stalker takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire cat takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Righting Reflex
entries: The cat takes no fall damage if it falls from a height of 30 ft. or greater.

trait.name: Pounce
entries: If the cat moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 12 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

action.name: Claw
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. 0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2).

reaction.name: Cruel Jest
entries: As a reaction when a Tiny creature attempts to leave the cat's reach, the cat may force it to make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw or be knocked prone.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (3d8 + 4) slashing damage plus 19 (3d10 + 4) acid damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape DC 14). Until this grapple ends, the crawler can bite only the grappled creature and has advantage on attack rolls to do so.

action.name: Acid Spray (Recharge 6)
entries: The crawler spits acid in a line that is 30 feet long and 5 feet wide, provided that it has no creature grappled. Each creature in that line must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw, taking 29 (5d10 + 4) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire caustic crawler takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire cave badger takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The badger has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Ornery
entries: The badger does not die or fall unconscious due to dropping to 0 HP if it was attacked by a hostile creature since the end of its previous turn. If the badger starts its turn with 0 HP without having been attacked since the end of its previous turn, it dies.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (3d8 + 2) piercing damage.

trait.name: Dire Rage

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The bear has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The bear makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (2d10 + 6) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 18 (3d8 + 6) slashing damage.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire cave fisher takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Flammable Blood
entries: If the cave fisher takes fire damage while below 30 hit points, it catches fire; until someone takes an action to douse the fire, it takes 25 (3d12 + 4) fire damage at the start of each of its turns, and deals an additional 25 (3d12 + 4) fire damage with its melee attacks.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The cave fisher makes two melee attacks, one of which may be with its bite.

action.name: Claws
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hits: 16 (3d8 + 4) slashing damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 19 (3d10 + 4) piercing damage and the target must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute. A poisoned creature repeats this save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

action.name: Adhesive Filament
entries: The cave fisher extrudes a sticky filament up to 60 ft. A creature that touches this filament is grappled (escape DC 15). The filament can be attacked (AC 15; 5 hit points; immunity to poison and psychic damage), but a weapon that fails to sever it becomes stuck to it, requiring an action and a successful DC 15 Strength check to pull free. Destroying the filament causes no damage to the cave fisher, which can extrude a replacement filament on its next turn.

action.name: Reel
entries: One Medium or smaller creature grappled by the cave fisher's filament becomes restrained  must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be pulled up to 60 ft. toward the cave fisher.

reaction.name: Angler's Set
entries: As a reaction to a creature becoming grappled by or failing an attempt to escape its filament, the cave fisher uses its Reel.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire ceratops takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Trampling Charge
entries: If the ceratops moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 18 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the ceratops can make one stomp attack against it as a bonus action.

action.name: Gore
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 32 (5d10 + 7) piercing damage.

action.name: Stomp
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one prone creature. Hit: 31 (4d12 + 7) bludgeoning damage

entries: If the cerodon moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 19 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the cerodon can make one stomp attack against it as a bonus action.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The cerodon deals double damage to objects and structures.

action.name: Gore

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The clawfoot has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the clawfoot's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

trait.name: Pounce
entries: If the clawfoot moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the clawfoot can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The clawfoot makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire constrictor snake takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Camouflage
entries: The snake has advantage on stealth checks if it is more than 30 feet from any hostile creature.

trait.name: Cold Blooded
entries: If the snake takes any cold damage, its speed is reduced by 10 until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Braille
entries: The snake's eyes are covered by transparent scales that protect them from harm. It has disadvantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight, and advantage on saving throws to avoid being blinded.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 11 (2d8 + 3) piercing damage.

action.name: Constrict
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. Hit: 13 (2d10 + 3) bludgeoning damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 13). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained and the snake can't attack another target.

reaction.name: Crush
entries: As a reaction to a creature the snake has grappled with its Constrict ability speaking or casting a spell with a verbal component, the snake crushes the air out of its lungs. The creature cannot breathe until the grapple ends and immediately begins to suffocate.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire cow takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Stampede
entries: When the cow moves, each adjacent cow may use its reaction to move with it. If one or more cows do so, the cow has advantage on attack rolls this turn.

trait.name: Trample
entries: If the cow moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

action.name: Gore
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 5) piercing damage.

entries: When the dire crab takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The crab can breathe air and water.

action.name: Claw
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4).

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire crag cat takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Nondetection
entries: The cat cannot be targeted or detected by any divination magic or perceived through magical scrying sensors.

trait.name: Righting Reflex
entries: The cat takes no fall damage if it falls from a height of 30 ft. or greater.

trait.name: Pounce
entries: If the cat moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the cat can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The cat has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (2d12 + 4) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d10 + 4) slashing damage.

reaction.name: Spell Turning
entries: As a reaction to succeeding on a saving throw against a spell of 7th level or lower that targets only it, the cat avoids all effects from the spell and instead causes the spell to target the caster.

reaction.name: Bat Away
entries: As a reaction to being hit with a melee attack, the cat forces the attacker to succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or have one object it is holding knocked out of its hands and 15 ft. away.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire crocodile takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: The crocodile can hold its breath for 15 minutes.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the crocodile remains motionless in water, it has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks when trying to pass itself off as a log.

trait.name: Poison Sensitivity
entries: If the crocodile has a creature grappled and takes 5 or more Poison damage from a single source, it immediately releases its grapple.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 15 (2d12 + 3) piercing damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 13). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the crocodile can't bite another target.

action.name: Death Roll (Recharge 6)
entries: A creature grappled by the crocodile must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or take 27 (4d12 + 3) slashing damage and be stunned until the end of the crocodile's next turn, or half as much damage on a success. A creature reduced to 0 HP by this ability loses a limb (crocodile's choice). The crocodile may not use this ability if it is grappled.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire crow takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Mimicry
entries: The crow can mimic simple sounds it has heard, such as a person whispering, a baby crying, or an animal chittering. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful DC 12 Wisdom (Insight) check.

action.name: Beak
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2).

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire dreadwolf takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Two-Headed
entries: The dreadwolf has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks and on saving throws against being blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, or knocked unconscious.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dreadwolf makes two bite attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d8 + 3) piercing damage.

trait.name: Dire Rage

trait.name: Beast of Burden
entries: The rothe is considered to be one size larger for the purpose of determining its carrying capacity.

action.name: Gore
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 5) piercing damage. If the rothe moved at least 20 feet straight toward the target immediately before the hit, the target takes an extra 25 (4d10 + 5) piercing damage.

action.name: Dancing Lights
entries: The rothe casts dancing lights, requiring no spell components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire deep spider takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Web-Dweller
entries: The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings and across webs, without penalty.
While in contact with a web, the spider knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The deep spider makes two foreleg attacks and one bite attack.

entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (3d10 + 6) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 18 Constitution saving throw, taking 42 (6d12 + 6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but poisoned for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is paralyzed while poisoned in this way.

action.name: Foreleg
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 26 (5d8 + 6) slashing damage.

trait.name: Leaping Pounce
entries: The deinonychus's long jump is up to 40 feet and its high jump is up to 20 feet, with or without a running start. If the deinonychus jumps at least 20 ft. then hits a creature with a claw attack, the target must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

trait.name: Foe-Climber
entries: If the deinonychus hits a Large or larger creature with a claw attack, instead of grappling it climbs on to the creature. While climbing on a creature, the creature has disadvantage on attack rolls that target the deinonychus.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The deinonychus makes two attacks, one of which may be with its bite.

action.name: Sawing Bite

action.name: Beak

action.name: Hooves
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (3d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Dire Rage

trait.name: Keen Sight

trait.name: Dive Attack
entries: If the eagle is flying and dives at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a melee weapon attack, the attack scores a critical on an 19, or 20.

action.name: Talons
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (2d6 + 2) slashing damage. On a critical hit, the target is blinded until the end of the eagle's next turn.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire egg hunter adult takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The egg hunter can breathe air and water.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: If the egg hunter is motionless at the start of combat, it has advantage on its initiative roll. Moreover, if a creature hasn't observed the egg hunter move or act, that creature must succeed on a DC 16 Intelligence (Investigation) check to discern that the egg hunter is animate. Dragons have disadvantage on this check.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The egg hunter makes two Barbed Proboscis attacks, and it can use Torpor Spores if it's available.

action.name: Barbed Proboscis
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 5) piercing damage plus 29 (4d12 + 5) necrotic damage, and the egg hunter regains hit points equal to the necrotic damage dealt.

action.name: Torpor Spores (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The egg hunter releases a billow of sparkling blue spores. Each creature in a 30-foot-radius sphere centered on the egg hunter must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute. While poisoned in this way, the creature can take either an action or a bonus action on its turn but not both, and it can't take reactions. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to this egg hunter's Torpor Spores for the next 24 hours.

reaction.name: Rapid Adaptation
entries: When the egg hunter takes damage, it gives itself resistance to that damage.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire egg hunter hatchling takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The egg hunter can breathe air and water.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The egg hunter makes two Egg Tooth attacks.

action.name: Egg Tooth
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (3d8 + 3) piercing damage, or 23 (5d8 + 3) piercing damage if the target is an object.

bonus.name: Rapid Movement
entries: The egg hunter takes the Dash or Disengage action.

action.name: Tail
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target not grappled by the lizard. Hit: 21 (3d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 17 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

name: Dire Elephant

action.name: Gore

trait.name: Springing Grace
entries: The elk's high jump is up to 10 ft., or up to 15 ft. with a running start. It may treat any surface at least 1 inch across as solid ground to jump off of.

action.name: Antler Rush
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is pushed 5 ft. away.

action.name: Rearing Kick

action.name: Unearthly Scream (Recharge 6)
entries: The elk releases a haunting sound. Each creature within 60 ft. must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or be unable to take hostile action on its following turn.

reaction.name: Elusive Sidle
