entries: The frog can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: The frog's long jump is up to 10 ft. and its high jump is up to 5 ft., with or without a running start.

reaction.name: Jumpy
entries: As a reaction to being targeted with a melee attack, the frog may impose disadvantage on the attack. If the attack misses, the frog may jump up to 10 ft. without provoking attacks of opportunity.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire frost worm takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Freezing Body
entries: A creature that touches the worm or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 35 (5d10 + 10) cold damage.

trait.name: Death Burst
entries: When the worm dies, it explodes in a burst of frigid energy. Each creature within 60 feet of it must make a DC 24 Dexterity saving throw, taking 60 (10d10 + 10) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Creatures inside the worm when it dies automatically fail this saving throw.

trait.name: Tunneler
entries: The worm can burrow through solid rock at half its burrowing speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The worm makes two bite attacks, or uses its Trill and makes a bite attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +16 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 30 (4d10 + 10) piercing damage plus 35 (5d10 + 10) cold damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 24 Dexterity saving throw or be swallowed by the worm. A swallowed creature is blinded and restrained, has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the worm, and takes 35 (5d10 + 10) acid damage and 35 (5d10 + 10) cold damage at the start of each of the worm's turns.

If the worm takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the worm must succeed on a DC 24 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall prone in a space within 10 feet of the worm.

action.name: Trill
entries: The frost worm emits a haunting cry. Each creature within 60 feet of the worm that can hear it must succeed on a DC 24 Wisdom saving throw or be stunned for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw each time it takes damage and at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. Once a creature successfully saves against this effect, or if this effect ends for it, that creature is immune to the Trill of all frost worms for the next 24 hours. Frost worms are immune to this effect.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire giant ape takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Reckless
entries: At the start of its turn, the ape can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls it makes during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Juggernaut Leap
entries: The ape's long jump is up to 40 feet and its high jump is up to 20 feet when it has a running start. If the ape jumps at least 20 feet, it may land in the space of any large or smaller creature. Each of those creatures must succeed on a DC 19 Dexterity saving throw or be knocked prone. On a successful save, is instead pushed 5 feet out of the ape's space into an unoccupied space of the creature's choice.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ape makes two fist attacks.

action.name: Fist
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 31 (4d12 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 35 (4d12 + 7) piercing damage. This attack deals an additional 47 (8d10 + 7) damage to a grappled creature.

action.name: Hurl
entries: The ape hurls a huge or smaller grappled creature up to 40 feet. The creature must succeed on a DC 19 Dexterity saving throw or take 47 (8d10 + 7) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone. On a successful save, the creature takes half damage and isn't knocked prone. If the target is thrown at another creature, that creature must succeed on a DC 19 Dexterity saving throw or take the same damage and be knocked prone.

action.name: Rock
entries: Ranged Weapon Attack. +11 to hit, range 50/100 ft., one target. Hit: 39 (8d8 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire giant badger takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The badger has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Ornery
entries: The badger does not die or fall unconscious due to dropping to 0 HP if it was attacked by a hostile creature since the end of its previous turn. If the badger starts its turn with 0 HP without having been attacked since the end of its previous turn, it dies.

trait.name: Tunneler
entries: The badger can burrow through solid rock at half its burrow speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The badger attacks once with its bite and once with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (4d8 + 5) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (4d6 + 5) piercing damage.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire giant bat takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Keen Hearing
entries: The bat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.

trait.name: Spirit Vapors
entries: The bat's breath is a heavy mist that settles across the ground beneath it. Creatures within 15 feet of the bat cannot benefit from invisibility.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The bat makes two melee attacks and uses its Echolocation.

action.name: Vicious Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 22 (4d8 + 6) piercing damage. This attack scores a critical on a 19-20.

action.name: Claw Rake
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (3d10 + 6) piercing damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 17). This attack is made at advantage against a flying creature.

action.name: Echolocation
entries: If the bat is not deafened, it gains one of the following benefits until the end of its next turn:

items.name: High Frequency
entries: The bat has advantage on melee attack rolls. Whenever the bat uses its Chaotic Swerve and the triggering attack misses it, the bat regains its reaction.

items.name: Sonic Assault
entries: At the end of the bat's turn, each nonbat creature within 30 feet that can hear it must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be deafened until the end of the bat's next turn and lose concentration, if it was concentrating.

reaction.name: Chaotic Swerve
entries: As a reaction when the bat is targeted with an attack, it may move 10 feet directly toward the nearest creature that is not riding it and impose disadvantage on the attack roll.
Then, if one or more creatures that are not riding it are within 5 feet of the bat, the bat and each creature within 5 feet of it must succeed on a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw or fall prone.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire giant boar takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Earth Scenting
entries: The boar has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell. It can sense the type, number, and direction of underground plants and animals within 25 ft. of it.

trait.name: Ploughing Charge
entries: If the boar moves at least 20 ft. in a straight line, it may move through the space of any huge or smaller creature.
When the boar enters a creature's space, the creature must succeed on a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw or be knocked prone, or move to the nearest unoccupied space on a success.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The boar makes two attacks, one of which may be with its trample.

action.name: Tusks
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 22 (4d8 + 6) slashing damage and the target is pushed 5 ft. away.

action.name: Trample
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one prone creature. Hit: 36 (5d12 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Rooting Rush (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The boar moves up to half its speed, dragging its tusks through the ground, then flings them forward. Each creature in a 15 ft. cone must succeed on a DC 18 Strength saving throw or take 46 (8d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone, or half as much on a success.
The ground the boar passed over with this movement becomes difficult terrain.

reaction.name: Foaming Defiance
entries: As a reaction to taking damage that would reduce it to 0 hit points, the boar makes a DC 18 Constitution saving throw. On a success, the boar is instead reduced to 1 hit point.
If triggered by piercing damage or a critical hit, this saving throw is made at disadvantage.

action.name: Peck
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d12 + 2) piercing damage.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire giant canary takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 8 (2d6 + 2) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or take 27 (5d10 + 2) poison damage. If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but poisoned for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is paralyzed while poisoned in this way.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire giant centipede takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire giant constrictor snake takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Water Camouflage
entries: The snake has advantage on stealth checks while submerged.

trait.name: Cold Blooded
entries: If the snake takes 5 or more Cold damage in a turn, its speed is reduced by 10 until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Braille
entries: The snake's eyes are covered by transparent scales that protect them from harm. It has disadvantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight, and advantage on saving throws to avoid being blinded.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. Hit: 17 (3d8 + 5) piercing damage.

action.name: Constrict
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. Hit: 20 (3d10 + 5) bludgeoning damag and the target is grappled (escape DC 15). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained and the snake can't attack another target.

reaction.name: Crush
entries: As a reaction to a creature the snake has grappled with its Constrict ability speaking or casting a spell with a verbal component, the snake crushes the air out of its lungs. The creature cannot breathe until the grapple ends and immediately begins to suffocate.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (3d6 + 3) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of its next turn. On a failed save, the target begins to hallucinate and is afflicted with a short-term madness effect (determined randomly or by the DM). The effect lasts 10 minutes.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire giant coral snake takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire giant crab takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Chemoreception
entries: While submerged in a body of water, the crab can detect the presence and location of creatures in that water within 60 ft.

trait.name: Brittle Shell
entries: If the crab takes 20 or more bludgeoning damage from a single source, its AC is reduced to 14 until it completes a short or long rest.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The crab makes two attacks with its claws.

action.name: Claw
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +10 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 30 (4d12 + 6) bludgeoning damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 18).

action.name: Crush
entries: One creature grappled by the crab must succeed on a DC 18 Constitution saving throw or take 78 (12d12 + 6) bludgeoning damage and suffer disadvantage on attack rolls that use Strength until it completes a short or long rest.

reaction.name: Scuttle
entries: As a reaction to being forced to make a saving throw against a spell or magical effect, the crab moves up to half its speed. If this movement puts the crab out of range or area of the spell or magical effect, the crab is unaffected.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire giant crayfish takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The giant crayfish can breathe air and water.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The giant crayfish makes two claw attacks.

action.name: Claw
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d12 + 3) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 13). The crayfish has two claws, each of which can grapple only one target.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire giant crocodile takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: The crocodile can hold its breath for 15 minutes.

trait.name: Poison Sensitivity
entries: If the crocodile has a creature grappled and takes 5 or more Poison damage from a single source, it immediately releases its grapple.

trait.name: Grapple Vulnerability
entries: The crocodile can be grappled by a creature up to two sizes smaller than it.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The crocodile makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 30 (4d12 + 6) piercing damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 17). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the crocodile can't bite another target.

action.name: Tail
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target not grappled by the crocodile. Hit: 21 (3d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 17 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

action.name: Death Roll (Recharge 6)
entries: A creature grappled by the crocodile must succeed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw or take 66 (10d12 + 6) slashing damage and be stunned until the end of the crocodile's next turn, or half as much damage on a success. A creature reduced to 0 HP by this ability loses a limb (crocodile's choice). The crocodile may not use this ability if it is grappled. nbsp;

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire giant dragonfly takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Drone
entries: When it beats its wings, the dragonfly emits a loud droning sound that can be heard out to a range of 120 feet.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Uncanny Dodge
entries: The dragonfly halves the damage it takes from an attack made against it, provided it can see the attacker.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire giant eagle takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Keen Sight
entries: The eagle has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Dive Attack
entries: If the eagle is flying and dives at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a melee weapon attack, the attack scores a critical on an 19, or 20.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The eagle makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its talons.

action.name: Beak
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 26 (4d10 + 6) piercing damage.

action.name: Talons
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 22 (4d8 + 6) slashing damage. On a critical hit, the target is grappled (escape DC 17).

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire giant elk takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the elk moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with an antler rush attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 25 (4d10 + 5) damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

trait.name: Springing Grace
entries: The elk's high jump is up to 15 ft., or up to 30 ft. with a running start. It may treat any surface at least 1 inch across as solid ground to jump off of.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The elk makes two melee attacks, one of which it may replace with its Unearthly Scream, if available.

action.name: Antler Rush
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (4d8 + 5) piercing damage and the target is pushed 10 ft. away.

action.name: Rearing Kick
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one prone creature. Hit: 25 (4d10 + 5) slashing damage. A prone target takes an additional 29 (4d12 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Unearthly Scream (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The elk releases a haunting sound. Each creature within 60 ft. must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or be unable to take hostile action on its following turn.

reaction.name: Elusive Sidle
entries: As a reaction to a creature ending its movement within 5 ft. of the elk, the elk moves up to half its speed in any direction other than directly away from the creature without provoking attacks of opportunity.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire giant fly takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire giant flying spider takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Web-Dweller
entries: The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings and across webs, without penalty.
While in contact with a web, the spider knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 13 (2d10 + 3) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw, taking 27 (4d12 + 3) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but poisoned for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is paralyzed while poisoned in this way.

action.name: Web (Recharge 5-6)
entries: Ranged Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, range 30/60 ft., one creature. Hit: The target is restrained by webbing. As an action, the restrained target can make a DC 13 Strength check, bursting the webbing on a success. The webbing can also be attacked and destroyed (AC 10; hp 5; vulnerability to fire damage; immunity to bludgeoning, poison, and psychic damage).

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire giant frog takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The frog can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: The frog's long jump is up to 40 feet and its high jump is up to 20 feet, with or without a running start.

trait.name: Poisonous
entries: A creature that hits the frog with a melee attack using Natural Weapons takes 33 (4d12 + 5) poison damage. If this damage reduces the frog to 0 hit points, the attacker must succeed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 33 (4d12 + 5) bludgeoning damage and 47 (6d12 + 5) poison damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 17). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the frog can't bite another target.

action.name: Tongue
entries: One Huge or smaller creature within 30 ft. must succeed on a DC 17 Strength saving throw or be pulled up to 25 ft towards the frog, which can use a bonus action to make a bite attack against it.

action.name: Swallow
entries: The frog makes one bite attack against a Large or smaller target it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target is swallowed, and the grapple ends. The swallowed target is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the frog, and it takes 35 (6d10 + 5) acid damage at the start of each of the frog's turns. If the frog dies, a swallowed creature can escape from the corpse using 5 feet of movement, exiting prone.

reaction.name: Jumpy
entries: As a reaction to being targeted with a melee attack, the frog may impose disadvantage on the attack. If the attack misses, the frog may jump up to 40 ft. without provoking attacks of opportunity.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire giant goat takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Ornery
entries: The goat does not die or fall unconscious due to dropping to 0 HP if it was attacked by a hostile creature since the end of its previous turn. If the goat starts its turn with 0 HP without having been attacked since the end of its previous turn, it dies.

trait.name: Pushy
entries: If the goat moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target is pushed 15 ft. away. If it is pushed into a wall or other solid surface, the creature takes an additional 31 (5d10 + 6) damage.

trait.name: Sure-Footed
entries: The goat has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it prone.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The goat attacks once with its bite and once with its ram.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 18 (3d8 + 6) piercing damage.

action.name: Ram
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 26 (4d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire giant hyena takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Rampage
entries: When the hyena reduces a creature to 0 hit points on its turn, the hyena can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a bite attack.

trait.name: Opportunist
entries: The hyena has advantage on attack rolls against a creature unless that creature hit it with a melee attack since the end of the hyena's last turn.

action.name: Latching Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 43 (5d12 + 8) piercing damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 20). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the hyena can't bite another target.

action.name: Crush Bones
entries: One creature grappled by the hyena takes 88 (10d12 + 8) piercing damage and must succeed on a DC 20 Constitution saving throw or suffer disadvantage on attack rolls and saving throws that use Strength until it completes a short or long rest.

reaction.name: Giggling Retreat
entries: As a reaction to being hit with a melee attack, the hyena moves up to 10 ft. without provoking attacks of opportunity, emitting an unsettling laugh. The attacker must succeed on a DC 20 Wisdom saving throw or be unable to move closer to the hyena this turn.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire giant lightning eel takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Water Breathing
entries: The eel can breathe only underwater.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The eel makes two bite attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (3d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 21 (3d12 + 3) lightning damage.

action.name: Lightning Jolt (Recharge 5-6)
entries: One creature the eel touches within 5 feet of it outside water, or each creature within 15 feet of it in a body of water, must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw. On failed save, a target takes 33 (5d12 + 3) lightning damage. If the target takes any of this damage, the target is stunned until the end of the eel's next turn. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage and isn't stunned.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire giant lizard takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The lizard can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Cold Blooded
entries: If the monitor takes 10 or more Cold damage, its speed is reduced by 10 until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Poison Sensitivity
entries: If the monitor has a creature grappled and takes 10 or more Poison damage, it immediately releases its grapple.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The lizard makes two attacks, one of which may be with its bite.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 26 (4d10 + 6) piercing damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 17).

action.name: Claws
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 18 (3d8 + 6) slashing damage and the target must succeed on a DC 17 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

action.name: Tail Thrash
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +9 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target the lizarad isn't grappling. Hit: 20 (2d12 + 6) bludgeoning damage and the target is pushed 10 feet away from the lizard. Each other creature within 5 feet of the target must succeed on a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw or take half the attack's damage and be pushed 10 feet away.

reaction.name: Drop Tail (1/Day)
entries: As a reaction to being hit with an attack, the lizard reduces the attack's damage to 0.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire giant octopus takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: While out of water, the octopus can hold its breath for 1 hour.

trait.name: Underwater Camouflage
entries: The octopus has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks and Deception (Charisma) checks made to impersonate natural terrain or another aquatic creature.

trait.name: Boneless
entries: The octopus can move through a space as narrow as 1 feet wide without squeezing.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The octopus makes two tentacle attacks, one of which it can replace with a use of its fling

action.name: Tentacles
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 22 (4d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it is grappled (escape DC 17). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained.

action.name: Fling
entries: One creature grappled by the octopus is thrown up to 30 feet. If a thrown target strikes a solid surface, the target takes 31 (5d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage. If the target is thrown at another creature, that creature must succeed on a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw or take the same damage.

action.name: Blanket (Recharge 5-6)
entries: Each creature in a 15 ft. radius sphere must succeed on a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw or be grappled and pulled up to 5 ft. toward the octopus. Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained. A creature without a swim speed makes this save at disadvantage.

reaction.name: Ink Cloud (1/Day)
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 55 hit points while underwater, the octopus exudes a 20-foot-radius cloud of ink around itself. The area is heavily obscured for 1 minute, although a significant current can disperse the ink. After releasing the ink, the octopus can use the Dash or Hide action as a bonus action.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire giant owl takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Keen Sight
entries: The owl has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Raking Flyby
entries: The owl does not provoke Opportunity Attacks from creatures that it started its turn hidden from.

trait.name: Silent Flight
entries: While flying in dim light or darkness, the owl can take the Hide action as a Bonus Action.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The owl makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its talons.

action.name: Beak
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 25 (4d10 + 5) piercing damage.

action.name: Talons
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (4d8 + 5) slashing damage. On a critical hit, the target is grappled and restrained (escape DC 16).

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw, taking 29 (5d10 + 4) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire giant venomous snake takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire giant rat takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The rat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Quick Squeeze
entries: The rat may move through any space larger than its skull without squeezing.

trait.name: Gnaw Through
entries: The rat can burrow a medium hole through one foot of nonmagical wood in one minute, or through one foot of stone or soft metal in ten minutes.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The rat has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the rat's allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The rat makes two claw attacks. If both attacks hit the same target, the target must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (3d8 + 5) piercing damage and the target must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or be infected with filth fever.

action.name: Claw
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 5) slashing damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 16).

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire giant raven takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Keen Sight and Smell
entries: The raven has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight or smell.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The raven has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the raven's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The raven makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its talons.

action.name: Beak
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (3d6 + 3) piercing damage.

action.name: Talons
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (3d8 + 3) slashing damage.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire giant riding lizard takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The lizard can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d10 + 3) piercing damage.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire giant rocktopus takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Camouflage
entries: The octopus has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks.

action.name: Tentacles
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +6 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (3d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it is grappled (escape DC 14). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the octopus can't use its tentacles on another target.

action.name: Ink Cloud (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: A 20-foot-radius cloud of ink extends all around the octopus if it is underwater. The area is heavily obscured for 1 minute, although a significant current can disperse the ink. After releasing the ink, the octopus can use the Dash action as a bonus action.

name: Dire Giant Scorpion
resist: poison damage from its own attacks

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire giant scorpion takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Slowed Metabolism
entries: The scorpion can survive up to a year without food or water, and up to two weeks without oxygen before suffering any ill effects.

trait.name: Heat Spasms
entries: Whenever the scorpion takes 10 or more fire damage from a single source, it makes a tail stinger attack against a random creature within reach.

trait.name: Brittle Barb
entries: If the scorpion is dealt a critical hit with a weapon that deals bludgeoning damage, it can't make attacks with its Tail Stinger until it completes a Short or Long rest.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The scorpion makes three melee attacks, up to one of which may be with its its Tail Stinger.

action.name: Grasping Pincers
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (2d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 17).

action.name: Tail Stinger
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +9 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 24 (3d12 + 6) piercing plus 34 (4d12 + 6) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw or be infected with wandering eye neurotoxemia.

action.name: Acid Spew (Recharge 5-6)
entries: One creature grappled by the scorpion must succeed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw or take 66 (10d12 + 6) acid damage, or half as much on a success.

reaction.name: Twisting Tail
entries: As a reaction when a creature grapples the scorpion, the scorpion makes an attack with its tail stinger against the creature.

reaction.name: Chittering Feint
entries: As a reaction when the scorpion misses a creature with a Tail Stinger attack, it may reroll the attack with disadvantage.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire giant sea eel takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Water Breathing
entries: The eel can breathe only underwater.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 20 (3d12 + 2) piercing damage.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire giant sea horse takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the sea horse moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 22 (4d10 + 2) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 12 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

trait.name: Water Breathing
entries: The sea horse can breathe only underwater.

action.name: Ram
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire giant shark takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Test Bite
entries: If the shark starts its turn with no hostile creatures within 5 ft. of it, it may Dash or Disengage as a bonus action this turn.

trait.name: Blood Frenzy
entries: The shark has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

trait.name: Electrosensitive
entries: If the shark takes lightning damage, it has disadvantage on attacks on its following turn.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 31 (4d12 + 7) piercing damage and the target begins to bleed. At the beginning of each of its turns, the target must succeed on a DC 18 Constitution saving throw or lose 23 (4d8 + 7) hit points, ending the effect on a success.

action.name: Ram (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The shark moves at least 20 feet in a straight line towards a creature that does not have all its hit points and makes a bite attack against it. If the attack hits, the target must succeed on a DC 18 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of the shark's next turn.

reaction.name: Circle
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 64 hit points, the shark moves up to half its speed without provoking attacks of opportunity. Each creature of its choice within 50 ft. that has fewer than 20 hit points must succeed on a DC 18 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire giant snail takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Salt Osmosis
entries: Whenever the snail starts its turn in contact with a pound or more of salt, it takes 1d4 necrotic damage. Using an action to sprinkle a pound of salt on the snail deals 1d4 necrotic damage to it immediately and another 1d4 necrotic damage to it at the start of its next turn (after which the salt rubs off), provided the snail has not withdrawn into its shell.

action.name: Slam
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Shell Defense
entries: The snail withdraws into its shell, gaining a +4 bonus to its AC until it emerges. It can emerge from its shell as a bonus action on its turn.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire giant snapping turtle takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The turtle can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Stable
entries: Whenever an effect knocks the turtle prone, it can make a DC 16 Constitution saving throw to avoid being knocked prone. A prone turtle is upside down. To stand up, it must succeed on a DC 16 Dexterity check on its turn and then use all its movement for that turn.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 25 (5d8 + 5) slashing damage.

trait.name: Dire Rage
trait.description: When the dire giant spider takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Web-Dweller
entries: The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings and across webs, without penalty.
While in contact with a web, the spider knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The spider makes two attacks, one of which can be with its Paralyzing Bite.

action.name: Paralyzing Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 21 (3d10 + 6) piercing plus 36 (5d12 + 6) poison damage.
A creature reduced to 0 hit points in this way stabilizes automatically, and becomes poisoned for the next hour. While poisoned in this way, a creature is paralyzed.

action.name: Grasping Legs
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +9 to hit, reach 15 ft., one creature. Hit: 22 (4d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 17).

action.name: Death Leap (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The deathleaper jumps up to 120 feet, and can land in the space of up to one Huge or smaller creature.
A creature whose space the deathleaper lands in must succeed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw or be knocked prone and stunned until the beginning of its next turn.
On a successful saving throw, the deathleaper instead lands in the nearest unoccupied space.

bonus.name: Tangleweb Launch (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The spider launches webbing in a 10 foot radius centered on a point it can see within 60 feet.

Each creature in the area must succeed on a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw or be restrained (escape DC 17). The webbing can be destroyed (AC 15; 15 HP; vulnerability to fire damage; immunity to bludgeoning, poison, and psychic damage).

bonus.name: Web Bind
entries: The spider attempts to wrap a grappled or prone creature within 5 feet in webbing, forcing it to succeed on a DC 17 Strength saving throw or be restrained (escape DC 17).
If the target is Large or smaller, the spider can attach the creature to its back as part of this action.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The lizard makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail. One attack can be replaced by Swallow.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 24 (3d12 + 6) piercing damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 17). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the lizard can't bite another target.

action.name: Tail
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 18 (3d8 + 6) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 17 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

action.name: Swallow
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one Medium or smaller creature the lizard is grappling. Hit: 24 (3d12 + 6) piercing damage. The target is swallowed, and the grapple ends. The swallowed target is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the lizard, and it takes 31 (5d10 + 6) acid damage at the start of each of the lizard's turns. The lizard can have only one target swallowed at a time.
If the lizard dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse using 10 feet of movement, exiting prone.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire giant subterranean lizard takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire giant swan takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Keen Sight
entries: The swan has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The swan makes two attacks with its beak.

action.name: Beak
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire giant toad takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The toad can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: The toad's long jump is up to 20 feet and its high jump is up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d12 + 3) piercing damage plus 24 (3d12 + 3) poison damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 13). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the toad can't bite another target.

action.name: Swallow
entries: The toad makes one bite attack against a Medium or smaller target it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target is swallowed, and the grapple ends. The swallowed target is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the toad, and it takes 28 (5d10 + 3) acid damage at the start of each of the toad's turns. The toad can have only one target swallowed at a time.
If the toad dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse using 5 feet of movement, exiting prone.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire giant vulture takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Keen Sight and Smell
entries: The vulture has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight or smell.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The vulture has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the vulture's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The vulture makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its talons.

action.name: Beak
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (3d6 + 3) piercing damage.

action.name: Talons
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (3d8 + 3) slashing damage.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire giant walrus takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: The walrus can hold its breath for 30 minutes.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The walrus makes two attacks: one with its body flop and one with its tusks.

action.name: Body Flop
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 22 (3d10 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Tusks
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 23 (4d8 + 7) piercing damage.

action.name: Sting
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 10 (2d8 + 2) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 12 Constitution saving throw, taking 27 (5d10 + 2) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but poisoned for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is paralyzed while poisoned in this way.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire giant wasp takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire giant weasel takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The weasel has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. Hit: 17 (3d8 + 5) piercing damage.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire giant white moray eel takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Water Breathing
entries: The eel can breathe only underwater.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire giant wolf spider takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Web-Dweller
entries: The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings and across webs, without penalty.
While in contact with a web, the spider knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 18 (3d10 + 3) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If the creature is reduced to 0 HP while poisoned, the target stabilizes automatically. The spider may make this attack as a bonus action against a prone enemy.

action.name: Legs
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hits: 11 (2d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 13).

action.name: Deadly Leap (Recharge 5-6)
entries: If the spider jumps at least 15 feet as part of its movement, it can then use this action to land on its feet in a space that contains one or more other creatures. Each of those creatures must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or be knocked prone and take 11 (2d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage. On a successful save, the creature takes only half the damage, isn't knocked prone, and is pushed 5 feet out of the spider's space into the nearest unoccupied space.

bonus.name: Bind
entries: The spider may use its webbing to restrain a grappled or prone target (escape DC 13). If the target is Medium or smaller, the spider may then attach the creature to its back as part of this action.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire girallon takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Keen Scent
entries: The girallon has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on scent, and can detect the presence of creatures up to 120 ft. away.

trait.name: Aggressive
entries: As a bonus action, the girallon can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

trait.name: Bowl Over
entries: If the girallon moves at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, the target must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The girallon makes five attacks: one with its bite and four with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 5) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +8 to hit. reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 5) slashing damage. Instead of dealing damage, the girallon can grapple the target (escape DC 16).

action.name: Slam
entries: The girallon slams two grappled creatures into each other. The creatures must each succeed on a DC 16 Constitution Saving Throw or take 47 (6d12 + 5) bludgeoning damage and be stunned until the end of the girallon's next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't stunned.

action.name: Hurl
entries: The girallon hurls a grappled creature up to 30 feet. The creature must succeed on a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw or take 55 (10d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone. On a successful save, the creature takes half damage and isn't knocked prone.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire gnarlid takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The gnarlid has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The gnarlid makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 5) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (3d8 + 5) slashing damage.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire goat takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Ornery
entries: The goat does not die or fall unconscious due to dropping to 0 HP if it was attacked by a hostile creature since the end of its previous turn. If the goat starts its turn with 0 HP without having been attacked since the end of its previous turn, it dies.

trait.name: Pushy
entries: If the goat moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target is pushed 5 ft. away. If it is pushed into a wall or other solid surface, the creature takes an additional 18 (4d8 + 2) damage.

trait.name: Sure-Footed
entries: The goat has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it prone.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The goat attacks once with its bite and once with its ram.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d8 + 2) piercing damage.

action.name: Ram
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (2d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire golden stag takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the elk moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 () damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

action.name: Ram
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Hooves
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one prone creature. Hit: 13 (3d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire great cat takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The cat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Pounce
entries: If the cat moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the cat can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (2d12 + 5) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (3d8 + 5) slashing damage.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire gremlin takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Aether Scent
entries: The gremlin can pinpoint, by scent, the location of refined or unrefined aether within 30 feet of it.

action.name: Claws
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d10 + 2) slashing damage.

action.name: Siphon
entries: The gremlin drains aether from an aether-powered device it can see within 5 feet of it. If the object isn't being worn or carried, the touch automatically drains aether. If the object is being worn or carried by a creature, the creature must succeed on a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw to keep it out of the gremlin's reach.

If the aether-powered device grants any bonus (to attack rolls, damage rolls, Armor Class, and so on), that bonus is reduced by 1. If the device has charges, it loses 1 charge. Otherwise, it stops functioning for 1 round. Left unhindered, a gremlin can completely destroy an aether-powered device.

name: Dire Grick
resist: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical attacks

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire grick takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Stone Camouflage
entries: The grick has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

trait.name: Perpetually Ravenous
entries: While the grick has an incapacitated creature grappled, it may make a beak attack against that creature as a bonus action. It may drag a medium or smaller incapacitated creature without expending additional movement.

action.name: Tentacles
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 19 (4d8 + 3) slashing damage and the target is grappled.

action.name: Beak

action.name: Thrash

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The grick makes two attacks: one with its tail and one with its tentacles. If it hits with its tentacles, the grick can make one beak attack against the same target.

action.name: Tail

trait.name: Keen Sight

trait.name: Gold Seeder
entries: The bones of fallen griffons have a spontaneous tendency to transmute tiny flecks of the surrounding  material to gold. This process is too slow to be exploited directly, but ancient griffon nests are often ready sources of gold ore.

trait.name: Diving Overrun

action.name: Multiattack

action.name: Beak
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 5) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (3d8 + 5) slashing damage. Instead of dealing damage, the griffon can grapple the target (escape DC 15).

trait.name: Dire Rage

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The wolf has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The wolf has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the wolf's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The wolf makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 19 (2d12 + 7) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 18 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

action.name: Claws
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 22 (3d10 + 7) piercing damage.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire hadrosaurus takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Booming Crest
entries: The hadrosaur can communicate simple ideas such as "Danger" or "Food" to each creature within 5 miles that understands it, using low-frequency sounds produced in its crest.

trait.name: Bird Hipped
entries: At the beginning of its turn, the Hadrosaur may rear up on two legs until the end of its turn. If it does, it can dash as a bonus acton this turn, and cannot use its multiattack.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hadrosaur makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Stomp
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 25 (4d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage. This attack deals an additional 23 (3d12 + 5) bludgeoning damage to a prone creature.

action.name: Tail
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (4d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire hammerskull takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the hammerskull moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 20 (4d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

trait.name: Sure-Footed
entries: The hammerskull has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it prone.

action.name: Ram
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (3d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire rabbit takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Escape
entries: The rabbit can take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire hawk takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Keen Sight

trait.name: Air Superiority
entries: If the hawk descended at least 60 ft. this turn, it may Dash or Disengage as a Bonus Action.

action.name: Talons
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (3d5 + 3) slashing damage. On a critical hit, the target is blinded until the end of the hawk's next turn.

action.name: Blood Drain
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage, and the mosquito attaches to the target. While attached, the mosquito doesn't attack. Instead, at the start of each of the mosquito's turns, the target loses 9 (2d6 + 3) hit points due to blood loss.

The mosquito can detach itself by spending 5 feet of its movement. It does so after it drains 10 hit points of blood from the target or the target dies. A creature, including the target, can use its action to detach the mosquito.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire giant mosquito takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire hippocamp takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Amphibious

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the hippocamp moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 23 (4d10 + 3) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

action.name: Hooves
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (3d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Ram
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The hippogriff has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the hippogriff's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

trait.name: Vicious Dive
entries: If the hippogriff is flying and dives at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a melee weapon attack, the attack deals an extra 19 (3d10 + 4) damage to the target.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hippogriff makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its claws.

action.name: Beak
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (2d12 + 4) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire hippopotamus takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Trampling Charge
entries: If the hippopotamus moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 18 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the hippopotamus can make one stomp attack against it as a bonus action.

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: The hippopotamus can hold its breath for 30 minutes.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 27 (4d10 + 7) piercing damage.

action.name: Stomp
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one prone creature. Hit: 31 (4d12 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire hoard scarab takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: If the scarab is motionless at the start of combat, it has advantage on its initiative roll. Moreover, if a creature hasn't observed the scarab move or act, that creature must succeed on a DC 13 Intelligence (Investigation) check to discern that the scarab is animate.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it has disadvantage on attack rolls until the start of its next turn.

bonus.name: Scale Dust (1/Day)
entries: The scarab releases magical glittering dust from its wings. Each creature within 5 feet of the scarab must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or be outlined in blue light for 10 minutes. While outlined in this way, a creature sheds dim light in a 10-foot radius and can't benefit from being invisible. In addition, every Dragon within 1 mile of the creature becomes aware of it and can unerringly track the creature. Casting dispel magic on the creature ends the effect on it.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire horizonback tortoise takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The tortoise can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Massive Frame
entries: The tortoise can carry up to 20000 pounds of weight atop its shell, but moves at half speed if the weight exceeds 10000 pounds. Medium or smaller creatures can move underneath the tortoise while it's not prone.
Any creature under the tortoise when it falls prone is grappled (escape DC 22). Until the grapple ends, the creature is prone and restrained.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +14 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 38 (4d12 + 10) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Shell Defense (Recharge 4-6)
entries: The tortoise withdraws into its shell, falls prone, and gains a +5 bonus to AC. While the tortoise is in its shell, its speed is 0 and can't increase. The tortoise can emerge from its shell as an action, whereupon it is no longer prone.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire horned frog takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The frog can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: The frog's long jump is up to 20 feet and its high jump is up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d8 + 2) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 12). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the frog can't bite another target.

action.name: Swallow
entries: The frog makes one bite attack against a Small or smaller target it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target is swallowed, and the grapple ends. The swallowed target is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the frog, and it takes 18 (4d8 + 2) acid damage at the start of each of the frog's turns. The frog can have only one target swallowed at a time. If the frog dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse using 5 feet of movement, exiting prone.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire giant polar bear takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Keen Smell

action.name: Multiattack

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (2d10 + 6) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 18 (3d8 + 6) slashing damage.

entries: When the dire hunter shark takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Blood Frenzy

trait.name: Water Breathing

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 20 (3d10 + 5) piercing damage.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The hyena has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the hyena's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (3d10 + 1) piercing damage.

trait.name: Dire Rage
trait.description: When the dire ice spider takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Web-Dweller
entries: The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings and across webs, without penalty.
While in contact with a web, the spider knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

action.name: Sapping Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 13 (2d10 + 3) piercing plus 21 (3d12 + 3) poison damage.
For the next minute, whenever the target takes any cold damage it takes 4 (1d8 additional cold damage.

action.name: Grasping Legs
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. Hit: 11 (2d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 13).

action.name: Frostsilk Globule
entries: Ranged Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, range 30/60 ft., one creature. Hit: 21 (3d12 + 3) cold damage and the globule sticks to the target (remove DC 13).
For each such globule stuck to it, a creature's movement speed is reduced by 10 and it takes 1 cold damage at the beginning of each of its turns.
If the creature takes any fire damage, each globule stuck to it melts away.

bonus.name: Cold Shock (Recharge 5-6)
entries: One creature grappled by the spider must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or take 21 (3d12 + 3) cold damage per frostweb globule stuck to it.
A creature that takes 10 or more cold damage in this way is additionally paralyzed until the beginning of its next turn.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire ice spider queen takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Cold Aura
entries: Any creature that starts its turn within 5 feet of the spider takes 19 (4d8 + 3) cold damage.

trait.name: Web-Dweller
entries: The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings and across webs, without penalty.
While in contact with a web, the spider knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 13 (2d10 + 3) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw, taking 27 (4d12 + 3) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but poisoned for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is paralyzed while poisoned in this way.

action.name: Icy Web (Recharge 5-6)
entries: Ranged Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, range 30/60 ft., one creature. Hit: The target is restrained by webbing, and takes 15 (3d8 + 3) cold damage at the start of each of its turns. As an action, the restrained target can make a DC 13 Strength check, bursting the webbing on a success. The webbing can also be attacked and destroyed (AC 10; hp 5; vulnerability to fire damage; immunity to poison, and psychic damage).

trait.name: Tunneler
entries: The kruthik can burrow through solid rock at half its burrowing speed and leaves a 2 1/2-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

trait.name: Gnashing Horde
entries: Any non-kruthik creature that starts its turn adjacent to one or more kruthiks takes 7 (1d4 + 5) per adjacent kruthik.

action.name: Multiattack

action.name: Stab

action.name: Spike
entries: Ranged Weapon Attack. +8 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 5) piercing damage and 20 (3d10 + 5) poison damage and the target's movement speed is halved until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Agitate The Swarm
entries: For the next turn, the gnashing horde ability of kruthiks within 60 feet deals an additional 1d7 (1d4 + 5) per adjacent kruthik.

action.name: Acid Spray (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The kruthik sprays acid in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw, taking 47 (6d12 + 5) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire lion takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The lion has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the lion's allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

trait.name: Stalking Pounce
entries: If the lion is hidden from each hostile creature, it may Dash as a Bonus Action. If the lion hits a creature with a claw attack on the same turn, the target must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d10 + 4) piercing damage. The lion may make this attack as a Bonus Action against a prone target.

action.name: Claw

entries: As a Bonus Action, the lion lets out a menacing roar. Each hostile creature within 15 feet must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened of the lion until the end of the lion's next turn.

trait.name: Dire Rage

trait.name: Mimicry
entries: The macaw can mimic simple sounds it has heard, such as a person whispering, a baby crying, or an animal chittering. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful DC 12 Wisdom (Insight) check.

action.name: Beak
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2).

entries: The goat has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it prone.

trait.name: Mimicry
entries: The parrot can mimic simple sounds it has heard, such as a person whispering, a baby crying, or an animal chittering. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful DC 12 Wisdom (Insight) check.

action.name: Beak
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2).

trait.name: Keen Sight and Smell
entries: The peafowl has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight or smell.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The peafowl has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the peafowl's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

action.name: Beak
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (2d6) piercing damage.

trait.name: Dire Rage

trait.name: Dire Rage

trait.name: Blood Frenzy

trait.name: Water Breathing
entries: The piranha can breathe only underwater.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3).

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire plesiosaurus takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Serpentine Neck
entries: The plesiosaurus can move up to 10 feet into any space large enough for a Small creature without squeezing.

trait.name: Countershading
entries: The plesiosaurus has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide from creatures above it in open water.

action.name: Shellsplitter Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (3d8 + 5) piercing damage.
This attack is made at advantage against a creature wearing Medium or Heavy armor.

action.name: Dark Water Ambush (Recharge 6)
entries: The plesiosaurus moves up to its speed in a straight line towards a creature it is hidden from and makes a bite attack against it.
If the attack hits, the target must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of the plesiosaurus' next turn.

reaction.name: Darting Snap
entries: As a reaction when a creature enters its reach, the plesiosaurus makes a bite attack against it, then moves up to 10 feet.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3), and the target must make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw, taking 19 (4d8 + 3) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire venomous snake takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire polar bear takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Ice Walk
entries: The bear can move across and climb icy surfaces without needing to make an ability check. Additionally, difficult terrain composed of ice or snow doesn't cost it extra movement.

trait.name: Concussive Strength
entries: A creature knocked prone by the bear must succeed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw or be unable to stand on its following turn.

trait.name: Rear Up
entries: The bear may use 30 ft. of its movement to stand upright until the end of its turn. While standing, the bear has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks and attacks made with its claws, and cannot attack with its bite.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The bear makes two claw attacks. If both attacks hit the same medium or smaller creature, it is knocked prone.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (3d10 + 6) piercing damage. This attack does an additional 30 (4d12 + 6) damage to a prone creature.

action.name: Claws
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 18 (3d8 + 6) slashing damage.

reaction.name: Run Down
entries: As a reaction to a hostile creature the bear can see ending its movement at least 20 ft. further from the bear than it started, the bear moves up to its speed towards the creature.
If the bear ends this movement within 5 ft. of the creature, the creature must succeed on a DC 17 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

action.name: Hooves
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (3d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Flyby
entries: The pteranodon doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.
