name: Dire Purple Worm
resist: weapon attacks not made from inside it

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire purple worm takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Tunneler
entries: The worm can burrow through solid rock at half its burrow speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

trait.name: Earth Quaker
entries: When the worm burrows 30 feet or fewer below the surface, 10 foot wide, 10 foot deep fissures open at the surface above where it passes. Creatures in the space where a fissure opens must succeed on a DC 24 Dexterity saving throw or fall prone in the trench, or move to the nearest unoccupied space outside the area on a success.

trait.name: Implacable
entries: If the worm fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead. If it does, it loses 25 hit points.

trait.name: Shock Sensitivity
entries: If the worm, or the ground within 30 feet of it is subjected to lightning damage, it cannot use its Terror From the Deep action on its next turn, and must use all of its movement to surface.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The worm makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its stinger.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +16 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 30 (4d10 + 10) piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 24 Dexterity saving throw or be swallowed by the worm. A swallowed creature is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the worm, and it takes 50 (8d10 + 10) acid damage at the start of each of the worm's turns.

If the worm takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the worm must succeed on a DC 24 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall prone in a space within 10 feet of the worm. If the worm dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse by using 20 feet of movement, exiting prone.

action.name: Tail Stinger
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +16 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. Hit: 26 (4d8 + 10) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 24 Constitution saving throw, taking 80 (14d10 + 10) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Terror From the Deep (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The Worm moves up to its burrow speed, then bursts from underground thrashing in a flurry of debris. Each creature in a 15 foot radius must succeed on a DC 24 Dexterity saving throw or take 70 (12d10 + 10) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone, or half damage on a success. As a bonus action, the worm may make a bite attack against a creature that failed this save.

reaction.name: Dweomersense
entries: As a reaction to being targeted with a spell of 4th level or above, the purple worm may move up to its burrow speed. If it is no longer a valid target for the spell, the spell slot is not expended and the spell caster may choose a different use for their action.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The wormling makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its stinger.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d10 + 4) piercing damage. If the target is a Small or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw or be swallowed by the worm. A swallowed creature is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the wormling, and it takes 19 (3d10 + 4) acid damage at the start of each of the wormling's turns.

If the wormling takes 10 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the wormling must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall prone in a space within 10 feet of the wormling. If the wormling dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse by using 5 feet of movement, exiting prone.

action.name: Tail Stinger
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw, taking 29 (5d10 + 4) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Dive Attack
entries: If the quetzalcoatlus is flying and dives at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a melee weapon attack, the attack scores a critical on a 18-20.

trait.name: Throat Pouch
entries: A creature grappled by the quetzalcoatlus is blinded and restrained in the quetzalcoatlus' throat pouch.

action.name: Savage Peck
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. Hit: 30 (5d10 + 5) piercing damage. On a critical hit, the target must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or be knocked prone and stunned until the end of the quetzalcoatlus' next turn.

action.name: Scoop
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (3d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 16) if it's a Large or smaller creature.

action.name: Battering Wings
entries: Each creature in a 20 ft. cone must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw or take 40 (7d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage and be pushed 5 ft away. A creature that fails this save by 5 or more falls prone, additionally. The quetzalcoatlus' speed is reduced to 0 until the beginning of its next turn.

reaction.name: Flip Back
entries: As a reaction to a creature falling prone within 10 ft. of it, the quetzalcoatlus makes a Scoop attack against the creature.

action.name: Invade Space
entries: The rat targets one humanoid within 5 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 10 Dexterity Saving Throw or have the rat enter its clothing or armor, sharing a space with it. While the rat is in the creature's attire, it has full cover, the target has disadvantage on attack rolls and Dexterity Saving Throws, and the rat moves with it. The creature may repeat this save at the end of each of its turns, dislodging the rat on a success.

resist: damage from attacks made without advantage

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire roc takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Keen Sight
entries: The roc has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Gargantuan Stature
entries: A creature adjacent to the roc may spend half of its movement to attempt a DC 23 Strength (Athletics) check. On a success, the creature climbs onto the roc. While climbing on the roc, a creature has advantage on melee attacks against the roc, and the roc can't make melee attacks against it. A creature that isn't prone may attempt this check as a reaction in place of an attack of opportunity.

trait.name: Implacable
entries: If the roc fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead. If it does, it loses 25 hit points.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The roc makes two attacks: one with its talons and one with either its beak or its shake off ability.

action.name: Beak
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +15 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 35 (5d10 + 10) piercing damage.

action.name: Talons
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +15 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 30 (5d8 + 10) slashing damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 23). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the roc can't use its talons on another target.

action.name: Shake Off
entries: Each creature climbing on the Roc must succeed on a DC 23 Strength or Dexterity saving throw (target's choice) or lose its grip and fall. The roc may then make a talon attack to catch a creature that failed this save as it falls.

action.name: Wing Attack (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The roc beats its wings. Each creature within 10 feet of the roc that isn't climbing on it must succeed on a DC 23 Dexterity saving throw or take 46 (9d8 + 10) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone. The roc can then fly up to half its flying speed.

reaction.name: Defiant Scream
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 124 HP, the Roc lets out a mighty screech. Each creature within 60 feet must succeed on a DC 23 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of the Roc's next turn.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +13 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 29 (4d10 + 9) piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 21 Dexterity saving throw or be swallowed by the whale. A swallowed creature has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the whale, and it takes 24 (3d10 + 9) acid damage at the start of each of the whale's turns. If the whale takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the whale must succeed on a DC 21 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall prone in a space within 10 feet of the whale. If the whale dies, a swallowed creature can escape from the corpse by using 20 feet of movement, exiting prone.

action.name: Tail
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +13 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 25 (4d8 + 9) bludgeoning damage, or 37 (7d8 + 9) bludgeoning damage if the target is an object.

While in contact with a web, the spider knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

If the target is prone, the kow can make one attack with its hooves against it as a bonus action.

trait.name: Stench
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 5 feet of the kow must succeed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Reckless Thrash
entries: At the start of its turn, the kow can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls during that turn. If it misses with an attack this turn, it falls prone and is stunned until the beginning of its next turn.

action.name: Blood Drain
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage, and the stirge attaches to the target. While attached, the stirge doesn't attack. Instead, at the start of each of the stirge's turns, the target loses 9 (2d6 + 3) hit points due to blood loss.

The stirge can detach itself by spending 5 feet of its movement. It does so after it drains 10 hit points of blood from the target or the target dies. A creature, including the target, can use its action to detach the stirge.

entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a small creature. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.
A creature that starts its turn in the bat's space is blinded until it moves, and if it moves this turn must move as far as it can in a single, randomly chosen direction.

items.name: Low Frequency

A creature whose space the swarm enters for the first time on a turn must succeed on a DC 11 Dexterity saving throw or fall prone. On a successful saving throw, the creature can use its reaction to move up to half its speed.

entries: One creature in the swarm's space must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or take 26 (5d10 + 1) poison damage, or half as much if the swarm has half its hit points or fewer.
A creature that fails this saving throw by 5 or more is stunned until the beginning of its next turn.

reaction.name: Skittering Clutch
entries: When a Medium or larger creature leaves the swarm's space, the swarm can force it to succeed on a DC 11 Strength saving throw or have the swarm become attached to it (remove DC 11) until the beginning of the swarm's next turn.

trait.name: Dire Rage

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: If the swarm is motionless at the start of combat, it has advantage on its initiative roll. Moreover, if a creature hasn't observed the swarm move or act, that creature must succeed on a DC 13 Intelligence (Investigation) check to discern that the swarm is animate.

trait.name: Swarm

bonus.name: Scale Dust (1/Day)
entries: The swarm releases magical glittering dust from its wings. Each creature within 10 feet of the swarm must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or be outlined in blue light for 10 minutes. While outlined in this way, a creature sheds dim light in a 10-foot radius and can't benefit from being invisible. In addition, every Dragon within 1 mile of the creature becomes aware of it and can unerringly track the creature. Casting dispel magic on the creature ends the effect on it.

action.name: Infestation
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +3 to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the swarm's space. Hit: 25 (6d8 + 1) piercing damage, or 17 (4d8 + 1) piercing damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer. A creature damaged by the swarm must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or contract a disease.
Each time the diseased creature finishes a long rest, roll a d6 to determine the disease's effect:
The creature is blinded until it finishes a long rest.
The creature's hit point maximum decreases by 5 (), and the reduction can't be removed until the disease ends. The creature dies if its hit point maximum drops to 0.
The creature has disadvantage on ability checks and attack rolls until it finishes its next long rest.
The disease lasts until it's removed by magic or until the creature rolls the same random effect for the disease two long rests in a row.

trait.name: Earth Tremors
entries: The wurm creates earth tremors as it moves overland or underground. Any creature that comes within 30 feet of the moving wurm for the first time on a turn must succeed on a DC 21 Dexterity saving throw or take 33 (5d10 + 8) bludgeoning damage and fall prone. Any structure or object anchored to the ground that comes within 30 feet of the moving wurm for the first time on a turn takes 33 (5d10 + 8) force damage.

trait.name: Tunneler
entries: The wurm can burrow through solid rock at half its burrow speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 32 (6d8 + 8) piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 21 Dexterity saving throw or be swallowed by the wurm. A swallowed creature is blinded and restrained, has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the wurm, and takes 43 (7d10 + 8) acid damage at the start of each of the wurm's turns. If the wurm takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the wurm must succeed on a DC 21 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall prone in a space within 10 feet of the wurm. If the wurm dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse by using 20 feet of movement, exiting prone.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire yak takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Trample
entries: If the yak moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

trait.name: Overheat
entries: If the yak takes any fire damage, it must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Gore
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 5) piercing damage.

action.name: Grunting Bellow
entries: Each creature within 20 feet that can hear the yak must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the beginning of the yak's next turn.
Until the beginning of its next turn, the yak may make a gore attack as a reaction against any creature that enters its reach.

reaction.name: Give Chase
entries: As a reaction to a hostile creature the yak can see ending its movement at least 20 ft. further from the yak than it started, the yak moves up to half its speed towards the creature.
If the yak ends this movement within 5 feet of the creature, it may make a gore attack as part of this reaction.

entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 36 (5d12 + 6) piercing damage.

entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 34 (4d12 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire utahraptor takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Leaping Pounce
entries: The utahraptor's long jump is up to 30 feet and its high jump is up to 15 feet, with or without a running start. If the deinonychus jumps at least 15 ft. then hits a creature with a claw attack, the target must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

trait.name: Foe-Climber
entries: If the utahraptor hits a Huge or larger creature with a claw attack, instead of grappling it climbs on to the creature. While climbing on a creature, the creature has disadvantage on attack rolls that target the utahraptor.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The utahraptor makes two attacks, one of which may be with its bite.

action.name: Crushing Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 16 (3d8 + 4) slashing damage. This attack scores a critical on a 17-20 against a prone creature.

action.name: Terrible Claw
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (3d6 + 4) piercing damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 15).

reaction.name: Mantle
entries: As a reaction to a prone creature within 5 ft. attempting to stand, the utahraptor makes a claw attack against it. On a hit, the target fails to stand.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire baryoynx takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Pounce
entries: If the baryoynx moves at least 30 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the baryoynx can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 23 (3d12 + 5) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 5) slashing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape DC 16). The baryonyx has two claws, each of which can grapple only one creature.

action.name: Stomp
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +11 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: 49 (6d12 + 7) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 19 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

action.name: Tail
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +11 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: 56 (7d12 + 7) bludgeoning damage

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire argentinosaurus takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire kronosaurus takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the kronosaurus moves at least 30 feet straight toward a target and hits it with a bite attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 41 (5d12 + 6) piercing damage.

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: The kronosaurus can hold its breath for 1 hour.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The kronosaurus makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 42 (6d12 + 6) piercing damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 41 (5d12 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire buffalo takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the buffalo moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 30 (4d12 + 6) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone and pushed 5 ft.

trait.name: Unpredictable
entries: The buffalo has advantage on saving throws against any effect that would control what action it would take, such as the charmed condition.

action.name: Ram
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (3d10 + 6) piercing damage.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire war ox takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the ox moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 26 (4d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

trait.name: Beast of Burden
entries: The ox is considered to be a Huge animal for the purpose of determining its carrying capacity.

action.name: Gore
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 18 (3d8 + 6) piercing damage.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire chicken takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Bad Flier
entries: The chicken falls at the end of a turn if it's airborne and the only thing holding it aloft is its flying speed.

action.name: Peck
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 8 (2d6 + 2) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d8 + 2) slashing damage.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire hummingbird takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

action.name: Peck
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hummingbird makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its talons.

action.name: Beak
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage.

action.name: Talons
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (3d8 + 4) slashing damage.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire giant hummingbird takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire cyclonosaurus takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The cyclonosaurus has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The cyclonosaurus makes one Bite attack and one Talons attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 37 (4d12 + 9) piercing damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape DC 21). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the cyclonosaurus can't Bite another target.

action.name: Talons
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 33 (4d12 + 9) slashing damage.

action.name: Wing Gusts (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The cyclonosaurus beats its wings, creating bursts of thunderous force. Each creature within 10 feet of the aerosaur must make a DC 21 Strength saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 72 (9d12 + 9) thunder damage, is pushed up to 30 feet horizontally from the cyclonosaurus, and is knocked prone. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and is pushed up to 15 feet horizontally from the cyclonosaurus.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire altisaurus takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The altisaurus has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The altisaurus makes one Stomp attack and one Tail attack. The altisaurus can't make both attacks against the same target.

action.name: Stomp
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +15 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 42 (8d8 + 10) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 23 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

action.name: Tail
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +15 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: 55 (9d10 + 10) bludgeoning damage and the target is pushed 20 feet away from the altisaurus.

action.name: Earthquake Stomp (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The altisaurus stomps its feet, sending tremors through the ground around itself.  Creatures on the ground within 60 feet of it must make a DC 23 Strength saving throw or fall prone and take 73 (9d12 + 10) bludgeoning damage, taking half as much damage and not being knocked prone on a successful save.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire regisaur takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The regisaur has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The regisaur makes one Bite attack and one Tail attack. The regisaur can't make both attacks against the same target.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +14 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 58 (7d12 + 9) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 22). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the regisaur can't bite another target.

action.name: Tail
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +14 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: 34 (5d10 + 9) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Swallow (Recharge 5-6)
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +14 to hit, reach 20 ft., one Huge or smaller creature grappled by the regisaur. Hit: The regisaur swallows the target, and the grapple ends. A swallowed creature is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the regisaur, and it takes 29 (4d10 + 9) acid damage at the start of each of its turns. The regisaur can have up to two creatures swallowed at a time.

If the regisaur takes 25 damage or more on a single turn from a swallowed creature, the regisaur must succeed on a DC 22 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate the creature, which falls in a space within 5 feet of the regisaur is knocked prone.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire titanoceratops takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The titanoceratops has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The titanoceratops makes one Gore attack and one Stomp attack.

action.name: Gore
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 38 (5d12 + 8) piercing damage. If the titanoceratops moved at least 20 feet in a straight line toward the target immediately before the hit, the target takes an extra 36 (4d12 + 8) piercing damage; if the target is a creature, it also must succeed on a DC 20 Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 20 feet from the titanoceratops and be knocked prone.

action.name: Stomp
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 38 (5d12 + 8) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Brutal Charge (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The titanoceratops moves up to twice its speed in a straight line.  It can make one Gore attack against each creature in its path, gaining advantage on the attack roll.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire mortar monkey takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Underfoot
entries: The monkey can take the Dodge or Hide action as a bonus action if it is within 5 feet of at least two Medium or larger hostile creatures, even if it is not obscured.

trait.name: Undersized
entries: While carrying mortar shell or another similarly heavy object, the monkey's speed is reduced by half and it can't take bonus actions.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d8 + 2) piercing damage.

action.name: Mortar Shell Bowl
entries: The monkey rolls a mortar shell it is carrying up to 30 feet. Each creature in the shell's path must succeed on a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw or be knocked prone, leaping over the shot on a success.

action.name: Operate Mortar
entries: The monkey interacts with a Monkey Mortar within 5 feet, choosing one of the following options:

items.name: Load Mortar
entries: The monkey loads a mortar shell it is carrying into the Monkey Mortar.

items.name: Adjust Aim
entries: The monkey chooses a direction for the mortar to point, and a number of d6s for the shell to scatter when it fires.

items.name: Light Fuse
entries: The monkey sets a fuse and lights it. At the beginning of the monkey's next turn, the mortar fires.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire gulvoorg takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Baying Pack
entries: A group of two or more worgs has disadvantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks.

trait.name: Predatory Bearing
entries: A creature that starts its turn with no adjacent allies and that can see the gulvoorg must succeed on a DC 19 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the beginning of its next turn.

trait.name: Crushing Weight
entries: The gulvoorg may enter the space of a prone creature. A prone creature that starts its turn in the gulvoorg's space must succeed on a DC 19 Strength saving throw or take 28 (3d12 + 7) bludgeoning damage and be unable to stand this turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The worg makes three attacks, one of which may be with its bite.

action.name: Claw
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 23 (4d8 + 7) piercing damage and the target is knocked prone.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 37 (5d12 + 7) piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape DC 19). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the gulvoorg can't bite another target.

action.name: Tail
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +11 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 22 (3d10 + 7) bludgeoning damage and the target is pushed 10 feet away from the gulvoorg.

action.name: Worry
entries: One creature grappled by both the gulvoorg and at least one of the gulvoorg's Large or larger allies must succeed on a DC 19 Constitution saving throw or take 87 (16d10 + 7) piercing damage, or half as much on a success.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire tomb spider takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Web-Dweller
entries: The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings and across webs, without penalty. While in contact with a web, the spider knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

trait.name: Tomb Tainted
entries: If the spider would receive any magical healing, it receives no healing and instead loses an equal number of hit points.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The spider makes three attacks, one of which may be with its tainted bite.

action.name: Tainted Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 20 (3d10 + 5) piercing plus 25 (4d10 + 5) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the end of the spider's next turn.
If a creature poisoned in this way would receive any magical healing, it receives no healing and instead loses an equal number of hit points.

action.name: Legs
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hits: 17 (3d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 17).

action.name: Web (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The spider launches webbing in a 10 foot radius centered on a point within 60 feet. Each creature in the area must succeed on a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw or be restrained by webbing (escape DC 17). The webbing can attacked and destroyed (AC 10; HP 5).

bonus.name: Bind
entries: The spider uses its webbing to restrain a prone or grappled creature within 5 feet (escape DC 17). If the target is Medium or smaller, the spider may then attach the creature to its back as part of this action.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire tomb spider broodswarm takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The broodswarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the broodswarm can move through any opening large enough for a small creature. The broodswarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

trait.name: Web-Dweller
entries: The broodswarm can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings and across webs, without penalty. While in contact with a web, the broodswarm knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

trait.name: Tomb Tainted
entries: If the broodswarm would receive any magical healing, it receives no healing and instead loses an equal number of hit points.

action.name: Flurry of Bites
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +4 to hit, reach 0 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (3d6 + 2) piercing, or 8 (2d6 + 2) piercing damage if the swarm has fewer than half its hit points.

reaction.name: Scuttle
entries: When the broodswarm would make a saving throw against a spell or magical effect, it can move up to 10 feet.
If this movement puts the broodswarm out of range or area of the spell or magical effect, the broodswarm is unaffected.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire swarm of tomb scarabs takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Lie Dormant
entries: The tomb scarab can go an indefinite period of time without food or water, so long as it has somewhere dry and dark to hibernate.

trait.name: Horrid Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny insect.

A creature whose space the swarm enters for the first time on a turn must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or fall prone.  On a success, the creature may use its reaction to move up to half its speed.

action.name: Tunneling Bites
entries: One creature within 5 ft must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or have 1d4 scarabs tunnel under its flesh. At the start of each of its turns, the creature takes 18 (3d10 + 3) piercing damage per scarab infesting it.

Applying fire to the bite wound before the end of the target's next turn deals 1 fire damage to the target and kills these tomb scarabs. After this time, these tomb scarabs can only be extricated with a DC 13 Wisdom (Medicine) check, dealing 18 (3d10 + 3) points of piercing damage to the afflicted creature as it is removed. Any effect that cures disease destroys all tomb scarabs infesting the target.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire tomb scarab takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Lie Dormant
entries: The tomb scarab can go an indefinite period of time without food or water, so long as it has somewhere dry and dark to hibernate.

action.name: Tunneling Bite
entries: One creature within 5 ft must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or have the scarab tunnel under its flesh. At the start of each of its turns, the creature takes 17 (3d10 + 2) piercing damage per scarab infesting it.

Applying fire to the bite wound before the end of the target's next turn deals 1 fire damage to the target and kills the tomb scarab. After this time, the tomb scarab can only be extricated with a DC 12 Wisdom (Medicine) check, dealing 17 (3d10 + 2) points of piercing damage to the afflicted creature as it is removed. Any effect that cures disease destroys all tomb scarabs infesting the target.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire stirge queen takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Breath Sight
entries: A creature that does not need to breathe is invisible to the stirge queen. A creature that holds its breath has advantage on checks made to hide from the stirge queen.

trait.name: Weakness-Seeker
entries: The stirge queen has advantage on attacks that target creatures afflicted with a disease.

trait.name: Miasmatic Hemorrhaging
entries: A non-stirge creature that has fewer than half its hit points and starts its turn within 30 feet of the stirge queen must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or be wounded (1d4, Save Ends at end of turn).

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
entries: If the stirge queen fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The stirge queen makes two attacks with her Pinning Talons.

action.name: Pinning Talons
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 25 (4d10 + 5) piercing damage.
Instead of dealing damage, the stirge queen may knock the target prone and grapple it (escape DC 16).

action.name: Blood Spear:
entries: Ranged Spell Attack. +8 to hit, range 30 ft., one target. Hit: 20 (3d10 + 5) piercing damage and the target is pushed 5 feet away.

action.name: Plague Blood Torrent (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The stirge spews forth a torrent of contaminated blood in a 30 foot cone. Each creature in the area must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or take 40 (7d10 + 5) poison damage, or half as much on a success.
A creature that fails this save by 5 or more is infected with Redding Ague.

reaction.name: Awaken Their Hunger (1/Day)
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 62 hit points, the stirge queen lets out a frantic hypersonic signal.
Each other stirge within 30 feet that can hear her may use its reaction to make a melee attack.

legendary.name: Fend Off
entries: One creature within 10 feet must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be pushed 5 feet away and knocked prone.

legendary.name: Feed Your Queen
entries: The stirge queen consumes one stirge in her reach that has fed in the last minute, killing it and gaining 14 (4d6) temporary hit points.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire stirge skullpiercer takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Breath Sight
entries: A creature that does not need to breathe is invisible to the stirge. A creature that holds its breath has advantage on checks made to hide from the stirge.

trait.name: Weakness Seeker
entries: The stirge's attacks have advantage against creatures afflicted with a disease.

action.name: Pierce Vein
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage and the stirge becomes Attached to the target (remove DC 14).

action.name: Draw Blood
entries: One creature the stirge is Attached to loses 5 hit points, then must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or be infected with Redding Ague.

action.name: Essence Transfusion (Recharges when the stirge uses its Draw Blood)
entries: The stirge revitalizes itself or a creature it is attached to with stored blood, restoring 24 (4d10 + 4) hit points.

reaction.name: Pierce Skull
entries: As a reaction when a humanoid creature the stirge is Attached to drops to 0 hit points, the stirge repositions itself, piercing the creature's head and gaining control of its body.
An affected creature is not incapacitated while at 0 hit points, and fails death saving throws automatically.
On each of the affected creature's turns, it moves under the stirge's control and takes the Attack action against a target of the stirge's choice.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire stirge harrier takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Breath Sight
entries: A creature that does not need to breathe is invisible to the stirge. A creature that holds its breath has advantage on checks made to hide from the stirge.

trait.name: Weakness Seeker
entries: The stirge's attacks have advantage against creatures afflicted with a disease.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the creaature takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, its hit points are reduced to 0. If the creature takes damage from another effect, it dies if the damage equals or exceeds its hit point maximum, otherwise it takes no damage.

action.name: Pierce Vein (Group Attack)
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) and the stirge becomes Attached to the target (remove DC 13).

action.name: Draw Blood
entries: One creature the stirge is Attached to loses 2 hit points. Then, if the creature has lost 6 or more hit points in this way this turn, it must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be infected with Redding Ague.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire sharktopus takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: While out of water, the sharktopus can hold its breath for 1 hour.

trait.name: Underwater Camouflage
entries: The sharktopus has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks and Deception (Charisma) checks made to impersonate natural terrain or another aquatic creature.

trait.name: Test Bite
entries: If the sharktopus starts its turn with no hostile creatures within 5 ft. of it, it may Dash or Disengage as a bonus action this turn.

trait.name: Blood Frenzy
entries: The sharktopus has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The sharktopus makes three attacks, one of which may be with its bite. It may replace one attack with a use of its Fling.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 31 (4d12 + 7) piercing damage and the target begins to bleed. At the beginning of each of its turns, the target must succeed on a DC 19 Constitution saving throw or lose 23 (4d8 + 7) hit points, ending the effect on a success.

action.name: Tentacles
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 23 (4d8 + 7) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it is grappled (escape DC 19). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained.

action.name: Fling
entries: Each creature grappled by the sharktopus is thrown up to 30 feet. If a thrown target strikes a solid surface, the target takes 32 (5d10 + 7) bludgeoning damage. If the target is thrown at another creature, that creature must succeed on a DC 19 Dexterity saving throw or take the same damage.

action.name: Blanket (Recharge 5-6)
entries: Each creature in a 15 ft. radius sphere must succeed on a DC 19 Dexterity saving throw or be grappled (escape DC 19) and pulled up to 5 ft. toward the sharktopus. Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained. A creature without a swim speed makes this save at disadvantage.

reaction.name: Circle
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 64 hit points, the sharktopus moves up to half its speed without provoking attacks of opportunity. Each creature of its choice within 50 ft. that has fewer than 20 hit points must succeed on a DC 19 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of its next turn.

reaction.name: Ink Cloud (1/Day)
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 87 hit points while underwater, the sharktopus exudes a 20-foot-radius cloud of ink around itself. The area is heavily obscured for 1 minute, although a significant current can disperse the ink. After releasing the ink, the sharktopus can use the Dash or Hide action as a bonus action.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire ancient remorhaz takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Heated Body
entries: A creature that touches the remorhaz or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 40 (6d10 + 10) fire damage.

trait.name: Tunneler
entries: The remorhaz can burrow through solid rock at half its burrow speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +16 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 30 (4d10 + 10) piercing damage plus 40 (6d10 + 10) fire damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 24 Dexterity saving throw or be swallowed by the Remoraz. A swallowed creature is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the remorhaz, and it takes 50 (8d10 + 10) acid damage at the start of each of the remorhaz's turns.

If the remorhaz takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the remorhaz must succeed on a DC 24 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall prone in a space within 10 feet of the remorhaz. If the remorhaz dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse using 15 feet of movement, exiting prone.

action.name: Terror From the Deep (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The Remorhaz moves up to its burrow speed, then bursts from underground thrashing in a flurry of debris. Each creature in a 15 foot radius must succeed on a DC 24 Dexterity saving throw or take 70 (12d10 + 10) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone, or half damage on a success. As a bonus action, the remorhaz may make a bite attack against a creature that failed this save.

reaction.name: Inner Fire
entries: As a reaction to failing a saving throw against a spell or magical effect, the remorhaz may choose to succeed. If it does, it takes 66 (8d12 + 10) fire damage that bypasses its immunity. A creature swalllowed by the remorhaz takes half this damage.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire adult remorhaz takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Heated Body
entries: A creature that touches the remorhaz or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 33 (5d10 + 8) fire damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 50 (7d12 + 8) piercing damage plus 33 (5d10 + 8) fire damage. If the target is a creature, it is grappled (escape DC 21). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the remorhaz can't bite another target.

action.name: Swallow
entries: The remorhaz makes one bite attack against a Medium or smaller creature it is grappling. If the attack hits, that creature takes the bite's damage and is swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the creature is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the remorhaz, and it takes 48 (8d10 + 8) acid damage at the start of each of the remorhaz's turns.

If the remorhaz takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the remorhaz must succeed on a DC 21 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall prone in a space within 10 feet of the remorhaz. If the remorhaz dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse using 15 feet of movement, exiting prone.

action.name: Terror From the Deep (1/Day)
entries: The Remorhaz moves up to its burrow speed, then bursts from underground thrashing in a flurry of debris. Each creature in a 15 foot radius must succeed on a DC 21 Dexterity saving throw or take 68 (12d10 + 8) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone, or half damage on a success.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire windclaw owlbear takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Keen Sight and Smell
entries: The owlbear has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight or smell.

trait.name: Bad Flier
entries: The owlbear falls at the end of a turn if it's airborne and the only thing holding it aloft is its flying speed.

trait.name: Concussive Strength
entries: A creature knocked prone by the owlbear must succeed on a DC 19 Constitution saving throw or be unable to stand on its following turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The owlbear makes three attacks, one of which may be with its beak. A medium or smaller creature hit with two claw attacks in a turn is knocked prone.

action.name: Beak
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 25 (3d12 + 7) piercing damage. This attack does an additional 28 (3d12 + 7) damage to a prone creature.

action.name: Windclaws
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 22 (3d10 + 7) slashing and the target is pushed 10 ft. away.

action.name: Meteor Drop (Recharge 5-6)
entries: While flying, the owlbear folds its wings and drops, taking 32 (5d10 + 7) bludgeoning damage. Each creature within 5 ft. of where it landed must succeed on a DC 19 Dexterity saving throw or take 63 (8d12 + 7) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone.
On a success, a creature moves to the nearest unoccupied space and takes half as much damage.

reaction.name: Wind Howl
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 83 hit points, the owlbear lets out an torrential howl. Each creature within 10 ft. must succeed on a DC 19 Strength saving throw or be flung up to 20 ft. away and knocked prone, or pushed half as far and not knocked prone on a success..

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire winterclaw owlbear takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Keen Sight and Smell
entries: The owlbear has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight or smell.

trait.name: Concussive Strength
entries: A creature knocked prone by the owlbear must succeed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw or be unable to stand on its following turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The owlbear makes three attacks, one of which may be with its beak. A medium or smaller creature hit with two claw attacks in a turn is knocked prone.

action.name: Beak
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 18 (2d12 + 6) piercing damage. This attack does an additional 27 (3d12 + 6) damage to a prone creature.

action.name: Claws
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 18 (3d8 + 6) slashing plus 24 (3d12 + 6) cold damage and the target is pushed 5 ft. away.

action.name: Wintry Hiss (Recharge 5-6)
entries: Each creature in a 15 ft. cone must suceed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw or take 48 (7d12 + 6) cold damage, then gain an equal amount of temporary hit points. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and gains no temporary hit points.
While a creature has these temporary hit points, it is restrained and cannot be stabilized.

reaction.name: Roaring Screech
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 67 hit points, the owlbear lets out an ear-piercing screech.

Each creature within 10 ft. must succeed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw or be disoriented, making attacks at disadvantage until the end of its next turn. Additionally, a creature that fails this save falls prone if it misses with a melee attack on its following turn.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire frogmouth owlbear takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Keen Sight and Smell
entries: The owlbear has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight or smell.

trait.name: Cryptic Plumage
entries: While it remains motionless, the owlbear is indistinguishable from a large tree branch by creatures more than 30 ft. away.

trait.name: Concussive Strength
entries: A creature knocked prone by the owlbear must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or be unable to stand on its following turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The owlbear makes three attacks, one of which may be with its beak. A medium or smaller creature hit with two claw attacks in a turn is knocked prone.

action.name: Frogmouth Beak
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 17 (2d12 + 5) piercing damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 16).

action.name: Claws
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (3d8 + 5) slashing damage and the target is pushed 5 ft. away.

action.name: Swallow Whole
entries: One medium or smaller creature grappled in the owlbear's beak must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw or be swallowed.

While swallowed, the creature is blinded and restrained (escape DC 16), and takes 41 (6d12 + 5) bludgeoning damage at the start of each of the owlbear's turns. While it has a creature swallowed, the owlbear's speed is halved.

reaction.name: Roaring Screech
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 56 hit points, the owlbear lets out an ear-piercing screech.

Each creature within 10 ft. must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or be disoriented, making attacks at disadvantage until the end of its next turn. Additionally, a creature that fails this save falls prone if it misses with a melee attack on its following turn.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire mottled owlbear takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Keen Sight and Smell
entries: The owlbear has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight or smell.

trait.name: Concussive Strength
entries: A creature knocked prone by the owlbear must succeed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw or be unable to stand on its following turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The owlbear makes two attacks, one of which may be with its beak. A medium or smaller creature hit with two claw attacks in a turn is knocked prone.

action.name: Beak
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 18 (2d12 + 6) piercing damage. This attack does an additional 27 (3d12 + 6) damage to a prone creature.

action.name: Claws
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (3d10 + 6) slashing damage and the target is pushed 5 ft. away.

reaction.name: Roaring Screech
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 47 hit points, the owlbear lets out an ear-piercing screech.

Each creature within 10 ft. must succeed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw or be disoriented, making attacks at disadvantage until the end of its next turn. Additionally, a creature that fails this save falls prone if it misses with a melee attack on its following turn.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire moat cat matriarch takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Aquatic Ambusher
entries: The cat has advantage on stealth checks while submerged. If the moat cat starts its turn submerged, it may dash as a bonus action this turn.

trait.name: Breaching Pounce
entries: The cat's long jump is up to 30 ft. and its high jump is up to 15 ft. while swimming. If the cat ends a jump from water within 5 ft. of a creature and then hits it with a claw attack, that target must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

trait.name: Charmable
entries: The moat cat has disadvantage on saving throws against any effect that would charm it.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The cat makes three attacks, one of which may be with its bite. If the cat hits with two claw attacks, it may make a claw attack as a bonus action.

action.name: Claw
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (3d6 + 4) slashing damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (3d8 + 4) piercing damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 15).

action.name: Death Roll (Recharge 5-6)
entries: A creature grappled by the cat must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or take 64 (10d12 + 4) slashing damage and be stunned until the end of the cat's next turn, or half as much damage on a success. A creature reduced to 0 HP by this ability loses a limb (cat's choice).

reaction.name: Drop Tail (1/Day)
entries: As a reaction to being hit with an attack, the cat reduces the attack's damage to 0.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire moat cat takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Aquatic Ambusher
entries: The cat has advantage on stealth checks while submerged. If the moat cat starts its turn submerged, it may dash as a bonus action this turn.

trait.name: Breaching Pounce
entries: The cat's long jump is up to 30 ft. and its high jump is up to 15 ft. while swimming. If the cat ends a jump from water within 5 ft. of a creature and then hits it with a claw attack, that target must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

trait.name: Charmable
entries: The moat cat has disadvantage on saving throws against any effect that would charm it.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The cat makes three attacks, one of which may be with its bite. If the cat hits with two claw attacks, it may make a claw attack as a bonus action.

action.name: Claw
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d8 + 3) piercing damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 14).

reaction.name: Drop Tail (1/Day)
entries: As a reaction to being hit with an attack, the cat reduces the attack's damage to 0.

name: Dire Malukant
resist: damage from attacks made without advantage
immune: piercing damage from nonmagical ranged attacks

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire malukant takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Gargantuan Stature
entries: A creature adjacent to the malukant may spend its full movement to attempt a DC 21 Strength (Athletics) check. On a success, the creature climbs onto the malukant's legs. A creature may attempt the same check to climb from the malukant's legs to its back, or from its back to its head.

items.name: Legs
entries: While climbing on the malukant's legs, a creature has advantage on attacks against it. If the malukant moves at least 20 ft. on its turn, each creature climbing on its legs must succeed on a DC 19 Strength saving throw or fall off.

items.name: Back
entries: While climbing on the malukant's back, the malukant cannot target the creature with melee attacks.

items.name: Head
entries: While climbing on the malukant's head, the creature has advantage on melee attacks against the malukant and the malukant cannot target the creature with melee attacks.

trait.name: Trampling Charge
entries: The malukant may move through the space of a Huge or smaller creature without penalty. When the elephant enters a creature's space, the creature must succeed on a DC 21 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

trait.name: Howdah
entries: The malukant carries a mobile fortress on its back. Up to eight Medium or smaller creatures can ride the malukant. Creatures riding the malukant have three-quarters cover against attacks made from the ground.

trait.name: Spear Maddened
entries: Weapon attacks against the malukant with the Reach property are made at advantage. Whenever the malukant takes damage from a spear, glaive, pike, or similar long, bladed weapon, it must make a DC 21 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save the malukant attacks the nearest creature it can see on its following turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The malukant makes two attacks; one with its bladed tusks and one with its stomp.

action.name: Bladed Tusks
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +13 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 43 (7d10 + 8) slashing damage and the target is pushed 15 ft. away and knocked prone.

action.name: Stomp
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +13 to hit, reach 5 ft., target. Hit: 38 (5d12 + 8) bludgeoning damage. This attack deals an additional 43 (5d12 + 8) damage to a prone creature.

action.name: Tusk Sweep (Recharge 5-6)
entries: Each creature in a 20 ft. cone must succeed on a DC 21 Dexterity saving throw or take 43 (7d10 + 8) slashing damage, be pushed 15 ft. away and knocked prone, or take half as much damage and be knocked prone on a success. A creature that succeeds by 5 or more takes no damage and can climb onto the malukant's head as a reaction.

reaction.name: Thrash
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 136 HP, the malukant thrashes. Each creature riding or climbing on it must succeed on a DC 21 Strength saving throw or take 38 (6d10 + 8) bludgeoning damage and fall prone in an unoccupied space adjacent to the malukant.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire gulon takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The gulon has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Concussive Strength
entries: A creature knocked prone by the gulon cannot stand on its following turn.

trait.name: Opportunistic Feeder
entries: The gulon scores a critical on a 16-20 against a prone creature.

trait.name: Quick Squeeze
entries: The gulon may move through any space larger than its skull without squeezing.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The gulon makes one attack with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Ravenous Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 27 (3d12 + 6) piercing damage. On a critical hit, the gulon gains 25 temporary HP. While it has this temporary HP, its speed is 15 ft. and it can't use its Multiattack.

action.name: Claws
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 18 (3d8 + 6) slashing damage and the target must succeed on a DC 17 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

action.name: Disgorge
entries: Each creature in a 15 ft. cone must succeed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw or take 36 (6d10 + 6) poison damage, or half as much on a success. If the gulon had any temporary hit points, it loses them and this ability does an additional 36 (6d10 + 6) poison damage to a creature that fails its save.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire carbuncle takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Calming Presence
entries: Each creature within 5 ft. of the carbuncle has advantage on saving throws to maintain concentration or to resist an effect that would Frighten it.

trait.name: Head Gem
entries: The carbuncle has a worthless translucent horny growth in its forehead that resembles a large ruby or garnet. A creature that pries it off with a successful DC 10 Strength (Athletics) check must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or contract leprosy.

action.name: Disarming Lick
entries: One creature within 5 ft. must succeed on a DC 10 Wisdom saving throw or be charmed by the carbuncle until the end of its next turn, or until the creature is hit with an attack. Attack rolls against a creature charmed in this way are made at advantage.

reaction.name: End Life
entries: As a reaction to a creature targeting the carbuncle with an attack or harmful spell, the carbuncle keels over and dies. The attacker may choose a new target.

reaction.name: Feign Death
entries: As a reaction to a creature targeting the carbuncle with an attack or harmful spell, the carbuncle keels over and appears to die. A creature may attempt a DC 10 Wisdom (Medicine) or Wisdom (Insight) check as a Bonus Action to determine it is faking. The attacker may choose a new target.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire bulette landshark takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Blood Sense
entries: The bulette knows the exact location of each creature within 120 feet of it that does not have all of its hit points.

trait.name: Shock Attack
entries: If the bulette starts its turn underground, creatures without tremorsense may not take reactions on its turn while within 5 feet of it.

action.name: Snapping Maw
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 40 (5d12 + 5) piercing damage.
The bulette may make this attack as a bonus action against a prone creature.

action.name: Erupt (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The bulette moves up to its burrow speed directly upward, bursting from underground in a thrashing flurry of debris, pushing each creature in its space to the nearest unoccupied space.
Then, each creature within 5 feet of it must succeed DC 16 Dexterity saving throw or take 25 (4d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone, or take half as much damage on a success.

action.name: Deadly Leap (1/Day)
entries: The bulette leaps up to 30 feet and can land in the space of any Medium or smaller creature.

Each creature whose space the bulette lands in must succeed on a DC 16 Strength or Dexterity saving throw (target's choice) or take 30 (5d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone, or take half as much damage and be pushed to the nearest unoccupied space on a success.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire bulette gohlbrorn takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Bonefin Display
entries: While burrowing just beneath the surface, the bulette's bony dorsal fin is visible and can be targeted.

A creature that can see three or more fins protruding above the surface in this way at the start of its turn must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the beginning of its next turn.

trait.name: Shock Attack
entries: If the bulette starts its turn underground, creatures without tremorsense may not take reactions on its turn while within 5 feet of it.

action.name: Burrowing Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 22 (3d12 + 4) piercing damage.
The bulette may make this attack as a bonus action against a prone or restrained creature.

action.name: Spew Stones (Recharges when the bulette burrows underground)
entries: Ranged Weapon Attack. +7 to hit, range 20 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (3d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage and the target is pushed 5 feet away.
On a critical hit, the target is knocked prone.

action.name: Create Pitfall
entries: While burrowing, the bulette excavates a 5 foot wide pocket of earth above it and just beneath the surface, leaving a thin skin untouched above that collapses when significant weight is placed on it.

A Medium or larger creature in this space or that that enters it for the first time on a turn must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or sink partially into the earth and be restrained in place until it spends its full movement to extract itself.
While restrained in this way, a creature can be targeted with melee attacks by creatures burrowing beneath the surface.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire bulette earthsteed takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Earthsteed
entries: The bulette can form a magical bond to a creature over the course of a long rest, which lasts until it uses this ability again.
A bonded creature can ride the bulette while it burrows, and while riding gains tremorsense out to a range of 30 feet. A creature riding a burrowing bulette cannot speak or breathe.

trait.name: Shock Attack
entries: If the bulette starts its turn underground, creatures without tremorsense may not take reactions on its turn while within 5 feet of it.

action.name: Snapping Maw
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 22 (3d12 + 4) piercing damage.
The bulette may make this attack as a bonus action against a prone creature.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire bulette hatchling takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Blood Sense
entries: The bulette knows the exact location of each creature within 120 feet of it that does not have all of its hit points.

trait.name: Shock Attack
entries: If the bulette starts its turn underground, creatures without tremorsense that may not take reactions on its turn while within 5 feet of it.

action.name: Armoreater Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (3d12 + 3) piercing damage.
This attack treats any AC higher than 15 as though it were 15.

reaction.name: Curl Up
entries: As a reaction when it is targeted with an attack or makes a saving throw, the bulette curls into a ball, gaining the following effects until the beginning of its next turn.
The bulette is blinded.
The bulette gains resistance to Piercing and Slashing damage.
Whenever the bulette takes 10 or more damage from a single source, it is pushed 10 feet away from the damage's source.

name: Dire Ankheg Mockery Monarch
languages: Any language spoken by a creature it has eaten

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire ankheg mockery monarch takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Burrowing Terror
entries: If the ankheg starts its turn buried underground, it has advantage on all attack rolls until the end of its turn.

trait.name: Tunneler
entries: The ankheg can burrow through solid rock at half its burrow speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The ankheg has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Regurgitative Reflex (3/Day)
entries: If the ankheg would fail a saving throw while it has at least one creature swallowed, it may choose to succeed instead. If it does, it immediately regurgitates each swallowed creature.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ankheg makes three attacks with its Sickle-Claw Strike, one of which it may replace with its Cavernous Maw or a use of its Acid Nectar, if available.

action.name: Cavernous Maw
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 22 (4d8 + 6) slashing damage plus 26 (4d10 + 6) acid damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 19).

action.name: Sickle-Claw Strike
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 26 (4d10 + 6) slashing damage and the target is pushed 5 feet away.
Each other creature within 5 feet of the target must succeed on a DC 19 Dexterity saving throw or take half the attack's damage.

action.name: Acid Nectar (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The ankheg releases any creatures it has grappled and regurgitates a glob of resinous, honey-like nectar in a 30 foot cone.

The area becomes difficult terrain, and a non-ankheg creature that starts its turn in the area or enters it for the first time on a turn takes 66 (10d12 + 6) acid damage, then must succeed on a DC 19 Dexterity saving throw or be restrained until the beginning of its next turn (escape DC 19).

bonus.name: Swallow Whole
entries: One creature grappled by the ankheg must succeed on a DC 19 Strength saving throw or be swallowed. While swallowed, the creature is blinded and restrained, and its attacks bypass the ankheg's resistances.
If the ankheg takes 40 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the ankheg regurgitates all swallowed creatures, which fall prone in an unoccupied space within 10 feet.

bonus.name: Mockery Drone Spawning
entries: Each creature swallowed by the ankheg must succeed on a DC 19 Constitution saving throw or take 42 (6d12 + 6) acid damage, or half as much on a success.
A creature killed by this damage has its skull and spine disolved and replaced with a Ankheg Mockery Drone, then is immediately regurgitated by the ankheg.

reaction.name: Seething Vitriol
entries: As a reaction to taking 10 or more fire damage in a turn, the ankheg immediately recharges its Acid Nectar.

reaction.name: Spell Turning
entries: As a reaction to succeeding on a saving throw against a spell that targets only it, the ankheg avoids all effects from the spell and instead causes the spell to target the caster.

name: Dire Ankheg Mockery Drone
languages: Speaks common but doesn't understand it

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire ankheg mockery drone takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Flesh Suit
entries: The mockery drone is ensconced in a perfect disguise of flesh, indistinguishable from a normal humanoid. While disguised, the ankheg Scything Barbs and Brittle exoskeleton traits are inactive, its AC is 11, and it cannot use its Spiral Constriction. It may emerge from its disguise as a Bonus Action on its turn.

trait.name: Brittle Exoskeleton
entries: If the ankheg takes 10 or more bludgeoning damage from a single source, its AC is reduced by 3, to a minimum of 11, until it completes a Short or Long Rest.

trait.name: Scything Barbs
entries: Whenever the ankheg moves into a space for the first time on a turn, each creature within 5 feet of it takes 6 (1d4 + 4).

action.name: Acid Spit
entries: Ranged Weapon Attack. +8 to hit, range 30 ft., one target. Hit: 40 (6d12 + 4) acid damage.

action.name: Spiral Constriction
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: The the ankheg enters the target's space and the target is grappled (escape DC 16).
While it has a target grappled in this way, the ankheg's speed is 0 and whenever it takes damage, the grappled creature takes an equal amount of slashing damage.

action.name: Terrifying Chatter
entries: The ankheg cheefully speaks an incomprehensible stream of inane and nonsensical chatter. Each creature that is concentrating on a spell that can hear it must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or lose concentration.

reaction.name: Punishing Barbs
entries: As a reaction to a creature failing at an attempt to escape its grapple, the ankheg forces it to succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or take 40 (6d12 + 4) piercing damage and be stunned until the end of the ankheg's next turn, or take half as much damage on a success.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire ankheg clutchmother takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Burrowing Terror
entries: If the ankheg starts its turn buried underground, it has advantage on all attack rolls until the end of its turn.

trait.name: Clutchmother
entries: When the ankheg dies, 10 Ankheg Nymphs that act on its turn burst from its corpse at the beginning of its next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ankheg makes two attacks with its Spined Claw Strike, one of which it may replace with its Fleshmelter Mandibles or its Burial Store.

action.name: Fleshmelter Mandibles
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 22 (4d8 + 6) slashing damage plus 26 (4d10 + 6) acid damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 18).
While grappled in this way, a creature takes 26 (4d10 + 6) acid damage at the end of each of its turns.

action.name: Spined Claw Strike
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 26 (4d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage plus 22 (4d8 + 6) piercing damage and the target is pushed 5 feet away.
On a critical hit, the target must succeed on DC 18 Constitution saving throw or be knocked prone and stunned until the end of the ankheg's next turn.

action.name: Burial Store
entries: The ankheg rapidly excavates a 5 foot deep hole, shoves a creature it has grappled in it, then buries it (escape DC 18). While buried, a creature is blinded, restrained, and can't speak or breathe.

action.name: Acid Drench (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The ankheg spits steaming acid in a 40 foot long, 10 foot wide line. Each creature in that line must succeed on a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw or take 46 (8d10 + 6) acid damage, or half as much on a success. A creature grappled by the Ankheg fails this save automatically.

reaction.name: Seething Vitriol
entries: As a reaction to taking 10 or more fire damage in a turn, the ankheg immediately recharges its Acid Drench.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire adult ankheg takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Brittle Exoskeleton
entries: If the ankheg takes 10 or more bludgeoning damage from a single source, its AC is reduced to 11 until it completes a Short or Long Rest.

trait.name: Burrowing Terror
entries: If the ankheg starts its turn buried underground, it has advantage on all attack rolls until the end of its turn.

action.name: Fleshmelter Mandibles
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (3d8 + 4) slashing damage plus 19 (3d10 + 4) acid damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 14).
While grappled in this way, a creature takes 19 (3d10 + 4) acid damage at the end of each of its turns.

action.name: Spined Claw Strike
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 19 (3d10 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 16 (3d8 + 4) piercing damage and the target is pushed 5 feet away.
On a critical hit, the target must succeed on DC 14 Constitution saving throw or be knocked prone and stunned until the end of the ankheg's next turn.

action.name: Acid Drench (Recharge 6)
entries: If the ankheg has no creature grappled, it spits steaming acid in a 30 foot long, 5 foot wide line. Each creature in that line must succeed on a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw or take 29 (5d10 + 4) acid damage, or half as much on a success.
If the ankheg has a creature grappled, that creature must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or take 39 (7d10 + 4) acid damage, or half as much on a success.

reaction.name: Seething Vitriol (1/Day)
entries: As a reaction to taking 10 or more fire damage in a turn, the ankheg immediately recharges its Acid Drench.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire ankheg nymph takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Half-Formed Exoskeleton
entries: Attacks with weapons that deal bludgeoning damage are made at advantage against the ankheg.

trait.name: Acid Burst
entries: When the ankheg is killed, each creature within 5 feet of it takes 2 acid damage.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the creature takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, its hit points are reduced to 0. If the creature takes damage from another effect, it dies if the damage equals or exceeds its hit point maximum, otherwise it takes no damage.

action.name: Gnawing Mass (Group Attack)
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) damage.
If at least three ankhegs contributed to this group attack and the target is wearing leather or cloth armor, it takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to the AC it offers.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire tarbosaurus bataar takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Opportunistic Feeder
entries: The tarbosaurus' attacks score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20 when targeting a stunned creature.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The tarbosaurus makes two attacks against different targets, one of which may be with its bite.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 35 (4d12 + 7) piercing damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 18). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the tarbosaurus can't bite another target.
