action.name: Tail
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 27 (4d10 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

reaction.name: Thrash
entries: As a reaction to a creature failing an attempt to escape its grapple, the tarbosaurus forces the grappled creature to succeed on a DC 18 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of the tarbosaurus' next turn. A creature that fails this save by 5 or more is instead paralyzed for the same duration.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire therazinosaurus takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Titan Clasher
entries: The therazinosaur scores a critical on a 19-20 against a Huge or larger creature with no adjacent allies. It may attempt to Shove a Huge or larger creature as a Bonus Action.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The therazinosaurus makes two attacks: one with its rending claws and one with its stomp. It may replace its rending claws with a use of its scything sweep, if available.

action.name: Rending Claws
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +12 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 33 (5d10 + 8) piercing damage. If the target has Natural Armor, it takes a cumulative -1 penalty to the AC it offers until the target completes a short or long rest.

action.name: Stomp
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 26 (3d12 + 8) bludgeoning damage. This attack deals an additional 29 (3d12 + 8) damage to a prone creature.

action.name: Scything Sweep (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The therazinosaurus sweeps its claws in a 20-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 20 Dexterity saving throw or be take 44 (6d12 + 8) slashing damage. A creature may use its reaction to fall prone and gain advantage on this saving throw.

reaction.name: Impale
entries: As a reaction to a creature falling prone within 15 ft. of it, the therazinosaurus makes a rending claws attack against it.

reaction.name: Puff Up
entries: As a reaction to taking cold damage, the therazinasaurus puffs its plumage, gaining resistance against the triggering damage.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire apatosaurus takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Thunderous Stride
entries: If the apatosaurus moves on its turn, the ground within 15 ft. of it becomes difficult terrain for all other creatures until the beginning of its next turn.

trait.name: Implacable
entries: If the apatosaurus fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead. If it does, it loses 25 hit points.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The apatosaurus makes three attacks, one of which may be with its head whip.

action.name: Stomp
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 28 (4d10 + 8) bludgeoning damage. This attack deals an additional 32 (4d12 + 8) bludgeoning damage to a prone creature.

action.name: Head Whip
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +12 to hit, reach 20 ft., 1 target. Hit: 32 (4d12 + 8) bludgeoning damage and the target must succeed on a DC 20 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of the Apatosaurus' next turn.

action.name: Tail Sweep (Recharge 5-6)
entries: Each creature in a 30 ft. cone must succeed on a DC 20 Dexterity saving throw or take 58 (10d10 + 8) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone, or half as much on a success. A creature that fails by 5 or more cannot stand, speak, or breathe on its following turn.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire pterodactyl takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Dive Attack
entries: If the pterodactyl is flying and dives at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a melee weapon attack, the attack scores a critical on a 19-20.

trait.name: Throat Pouch
entries: A Medium or smaller creature grappled by the pterodactyl is blinded and restrained in the pterodactyl's throat pouch.

action.name: Savage Peck
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. Hit: 18 (3d10 + 3) piercing damage. On a critical hit, the target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be knocked prone and stunned until the end of the pterodactyl's next turn.

action.name: Scoop
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 13) if it's a Medium or smaller creature.

action.name: Battering Wings (Recharge 5-6)
entries: Each creature in a 10 ft. cone must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or take 28 (5d10 + 3) bludgeoning damage and be pushed 5 ft away. A creature that fails this save by 5 or more falls prone, additionally. The pterodactyl's speed is reduced to 0 until the beginning of its next turn.

reaction.name: Flip Back
entries: As a reaction to a creature falling prone within 10 ft. of it, the pterodactyl makes a Scoop attack against the creature.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire liopleurodon takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Countershading
entries: The liopleurodon has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide from creatures above it in open water.

trait.name: Outsize Head
entries: When the liopleurodon hits a Huge or larger creature with a bite attack, it may use its Bucking Thrash as a Bonus Action, if available.

action.name: Shellcrusher Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 43 (5d12 + 8) piercing damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 20).
Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the liopleurodon can't bite another target. This attack is made at advantage against a creature wearing Medium or Heavy armor.

action.name: Dark Water Ambush
entries: The liopleurodon moves up to its speed in a straight line towards a creature it is hidden from and makes an attack against it with its Shellcrusher Bite.
If the attack hits, the target takes an additional 40 (4d12 + 8) piercing damage and must succeed on a DC 20 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of the plesiosaurus' next turn.

action.name: Bucking Thrash (Recharge 5-6)
entries: One creature grappled by the liopleurodon must succeed on a DC 20 Constitution saving throw or take 92 (12d12 + 8) slashing damage, or half as much on a success.
A creature that fails this save by 10 or more has a limb of its choice torn off and is released from the grapple, then drops to 0 hit points.

reaction.name: Circle (1/Day)
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 64 hit points, the liopleurodon moves up to half its speed without provoking attacks of opportunity.
Each creature of its choice within 50 feet that has fewer than 20 hit points must succeed on a DC 20 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of the liopleurodon's next turn.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire elasmosaurus takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Serpentine Neck
entries: The elasmosaurus can move up to 20 feet into any space large enough for a Medium creature without squeezing.

trait.name: Countershading
entries: The elasmosaurus has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide from creatures above it in open water.

action.name: Cage-Mouth Bite
entries: One creature within 20 feet of the elasmosaurus must succeed on a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw or take 23 (4d8 + 7) piercing damage and be grappled and restrained (escape DC 18), or take half as much damage on a success.
Whenever the elasmosaurus uses this ability, each creature already grappled in its mouth is dragged to the nearest unoccupied space to the target, then may use its reaction to attempt to escape.

action.name: Dark Water Ambush
entries: The elasmosaurus moves up to its speed in a straight line towards a creature it is hidden from and uses its Cage-Mouth Bite against it.
If the attack hits, the target takes an additional 32 (5d10 + 7) piercing damage and must succeed on a DC 18 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of the plesiosaurus' next turn.

action.name: Sediment Churn (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The elasmosaurus dives up to its speed straight down and attempts to Hide.

If it ends this movement within 10 feet of the bed of the body of water it is submerged in, it kicks up a cloud of murky sediment, heavily obscuring the area in a 20 foot radius around itself that lasts until the end of its next turn.

reaction.name: Darting Snap
entries: As a reaction when a creature enters its reach (20 foot radius), the elasmosaurus uses its Cage-Mouth Bite against it, then moves up to 10 feet.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire pachycephalosaurus takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Butting Rush
entries: If the pachycephalosaurus moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target, attacks it makes against that target this turn are at advantage.

trait.name: Locked Spine
entries: As a bonus action, the pachycephalosaurus may attempt a DC 16 Strength (Athletics) check, breaking through a wood or stone wall of up to 8 inches thick on a success.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The pachycephalosaurus makes two attacks, one of which may be with its flank ram.

action.name: Flank Ram
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 21 (4d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage. If this attack was made at advantage, it deals an additional 25 (4d10 + 5) damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Bully Charge (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The pachycephalosaurus attempts to shove a creature. If it succeeds, it may make another shove attempt against the same target, and continue doing so until it fails or runs out of movement. The target then takes 26 (3d12 + 5) damage for each 5 feet it was pushed.

reaction.name: Tail Lash
entries: As a reaction to a creature hitting it with an attack of opportunity, the pachycephalosaurus makes a tail attack.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire stygimoloch takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Butting Rush
entries: If the dracorex moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target, attacks it makes against that target this turn are at advantage.

action.name: Flank Ram
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 16 (3d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If this attack was made at advantage, it deals an additional 24 (4d10 + 4) damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Bully Charge (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The stygimoloch attempts to shove a creature. If it succeeds, it may make another shove attempt against the same target, and continue doing so until it fails or runs out of movement. The target then takes 22 (3d12 + 4) damage for each 5 feet it was pushed.

reaction.name: Tail Lash
entries: As a reaction to a creature hitting it with an attack of opportunity, the stygimoloch makes a tail attack.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire dracorex takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Butting Rush
entries: If the dracorex moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target, attacks it makes against that target this turn are at advantage.

action.name: Flank Ram
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 11 (2d8 + 3) slashing damage. If this attack was made at advantage, it deals an additional 23 (4d10 + 3) damage.

action.name: Bully Charge (Recharge 6)
entries: The dracorex attempts to shove a creature. If it succeeds, it may make another shove attempt against the same target, and continue doing so until it fails or runs out of movement. The target then takes 18 (3d10 + 3) damage for each 5 feet it was pushed.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire torosaurus takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Trampling Charge
entries: If the torosaurus moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a creature and then hits it with a goring horns attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 18 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

trait.name: Bony Frill
entries: While the torosaurus is not flanked, it has resistance to Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing damage dealt by melee attacks.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The torosaurus makes up to two attacks; one with its gore and one with its stomp, if available.

action.name: Goring Horns
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 32 (5d10 + 7) piercing damage and the target is pushed 5 ft. away.

action.name: Stomp
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one prone creature. Hit: 31 (4d12 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

reaction.name: Dominance Display
entries: As a reaction to being hit with a ranged attack by a creature within 30 ft., the torosaurus shakes its horns. The attacker may use its reaction to drop prone; if the creature does not, or if it stands before the end of its turn, the torosaurus may move up to 30 ft. towards it and make a gore attack.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire centrosaurus takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Trampling Charge
entries: If the centrosaurus moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a creature and then hits it with a goring horns attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 17 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

trait.name: Bony Frill
entries: While the centrosaurus is not flanked, it has resistance to Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing damage dealt by melee attacks.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The centrosaurus makes up to two attacks; one with its gore and one with its stomp, if available.

action.name: Goring Horns
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 26 (4d10 + 6) piercing damage and the target is pushed 5 ft. away.

action.name: Stomp
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one prone creature. Hit: 24 (3d12 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

reaction.name: Dominance Display
entries: As a reaction to being hit with a ranged attack by a creature within 30 ft., the centrosaurus shakes its horn. The attacker may use its reaction to drop prone; if the creature does not, or if it stands before the end of its turn, the centrosaurus may move up to 30 ft. towards it and make a gore attack.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire yak bull takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Trample
entries: If the yak moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

trait.name: Overheat
entries: If the yak takes any fire damage, it must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Gore
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (2d12 + 5) piercing damage.

action.name: Grunting Bellow
entries: Each creature within 20 feet that can hear the yak must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the beginning of the yak's next turn.
Until the beginning of its next turn, the yak may make a gore attack as a reaction against any creature that enters its reach.

reaction.name: Give Chase
entries: As a reaction to a hostile creature the yak can see ending its movement at least 20 ft. further from the yak than it started, the yak moves up to half its speed towards the creature.
If the yak ends this movement within 5 feet of the creature, it may make a gore attack as part of this reaction.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire yak dri takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Trample
entries: If the yak moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

trait.name: Overheat
entries: If the yak takes any fire damage, it must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Wooly Butt
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d10 + 4) bludgeoning damage and the target is pushed 5 feet away.

reaction.name: Give Chase
entries: As a reaction to a hostile creature the yak can see ending its movement at least 20 ft. further from the yak than it started, the yak moves up to half its speed towards the creature.
If the yak ends this movement within 5 feet of the creature, it may make a wooly butt attack as part of this reaction.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire trapjaw turtle takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Sand Burrower
entries: While partially buried in sand, the turtle has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks.

trait.name: Inflexible
entries: The turtle cannot attack a creature that is grappling or riding it.

trait.name: Cold Blooded
entries: If the turtle takes 10 or more cold damage from a single source, its speed is reduced by 10 until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Clamping Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 41 (5d12 + 6) piercing damage and the target is grappled and restrained (escape DC 17).
A creature that attempts to escape this grapple takes 26 (4d10 + 6) piercing damage.

action.name: Drag Down
entries: The turtle moves up to its burrow speed, then a creature grappled by it must succeed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw or lose its breath, if it was holding it.

action.name: Tongue Lure
entries: The turtle shifts a shiny organ at the tip of its tongue slightly. Each creature within 30 feet that the turtle is hidden from notices what looks like something metallic partially buried in sand.

reaction.name: Snap
entries: As a reaction when a creature fails an attempt to grapple it or grab its tongue, the turtle makes a Clamping Bite attack against the creature.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire giant turtle takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Bottom Camouflage
entries: While motionless at the bottom of a waterway, the turtle has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to blend in with its environment.

trait.name: Retract Head
entries: As a Bonus Action, the turtle may retract its limbs and head into its shell and end its turn. Until the beginning of its next turn, the tortoise's AC is increased to 20 and it can't take reactions.

trait.name: Cold Blooded
entries: If the turtle takes 10 or more cold damage from a single source, its speed is reduced by 10 until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Clamping Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 34 (4d12 + 6) piercing damage and the target is grappled and restrained (escape DC 17).
A creature that attempts to escape this grapple takes 26 (4d10 + 6) piercing damage.

action.name: Tongue Lure
entries: The turtle shifts a shiny organ at the tip of its tongue slightly. Each creature within 30 feet that the turtle is hidden from notices what looks like something metallic partially buried in the silt.

reaction.name: Snap
entries: As a reaction when a creature fails an attempt to grapple it or grab its tongue, the turtle makes a Clamping Bite attack against the creature.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire snapping turtle takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Inflexible
entries: The turtle cannot attack a creature that is grappling it.

trait.name: Cold Blooded
entries: If the turtle takes any cold damage, its speed is reduced by 10 until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Clamping Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d10 + 3) piercing damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 13).
A creature that attempts to escape this grapple takes 15 (3d8 + 3) piercing damage.

action.name: Obstinate Plant
entries: Until the beginning of its next turn, the turtle gains advantage on Strength checks and saving throws, and a Medium or Large creature that attempts to move through its space must succeed on DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or fall prone.

reaction.name: Snap
entries: As a reaction when a creature fails an attempt to grapple it, the turtle makes a melee attack against the creature.

reaction.name: Sudden Dive
entries: As a reaction to being missed with a melee attack while swimming, the turtle moves up to half its speed directly downward without provoking attacks of opportunity.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire sulcata tortoise takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Retract Head
entries: As a Bonus Action, the tortoise may retract its limbs and head into its shell and end its turn. Until the beginning of its next turn, the tortoise's AC is increased to 18 and it can't take reactions.

trait.name: Helpless Inflexibility
entries: While prone or grappled by a Small or larger creature, the tortoise cannot take Actions other than Bonus Actions.

action.name: Obstinate Plant
entries: Until the beginning of its next turn, the tortoise gains advantage on Strength checks and saving throws, and a Medium or Large creature that attempts to move through its space must succeed on DC 10 Dexterity saving throw or fall prone.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire turtle takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Retract Head
entries: As a Bonus Action, the turtle may retract its limbs and head into its shell and end its turn. Until the beginning of its next turn, the turtle's AC is increased to 17 and it can't take reactions.

trait.name: Helpless Inflexibility
entries: While prone or grappled by a Small or larger creature, the turtle cannot take Actions other than Bonus Actions.

action.name: Gentle Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one Medum or smaller target. Hit: The turtle attaches itself to one of the target's limbs.
Melee attacks made with that limb are at disadvantage until the creature uses a Bonus Action to remove the turtle.

reaction.name: Sudden Dive
entries: As a reaction to being missed with a melee attack while swimming, the turtle moves up to half its speed directly downward without provoking attacks of opportunity.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire boretooth squirrel takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Zig-Zag
entries: The first time each turn that a creature ends its movement within 5 feet of the squirrel, it may move up to 10 feet without provoking attacks of opportunity.

trait.name: Gliding Membranes
entries: The squirrel glides 10 feet at no movement cost to it for every 5 feet that it falls.

trait.name: Skittish
entries: A creature within 30 feet of the squirrel that is hidden from it must make a new stealth check at the beginning of each of its turns to remain hidden from it.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The squirrel makes two attacks with its Skullcracker Bite.

action.name: Skullcracker Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage. Instead of dealing damage, the squirrel may grapple the target (escape DC 14), stuffing the creature's head in its mouth.
This attack deals an additional 20 (4d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage to creature grappled in this way.

action.name: Scolding Alarm
entries: The squirrel chirps forth a complex alarm signal. Each creature that the squirrel can see ceases to be hidden from any creature that can hear the squirrel.

reaction.name: Break Fall
entries: As a reaction when the squirrel passes within 5 feet of a climbable vertical surface while falling, it climbs onto the surface, arresting its fall and taking no damage.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire flying squirrel takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Gliding Membranes
entries: The squirrel glides 10 feet at no movement cost to it for every 5 feet that it falls.

trait.name: Skittish
entries: A creature within 30 feet of the squirrel that is hidden from it must make a new stealth check at the beginning of each of its turns to remain hidden from it.

action.name: Scolding Alarm
entries: The squirrel chirps forth a complex alarm signal. Each creature that the squirrel can see ceases to be hidden from any creature that can hear the squirrel.

reaction.name: Break Fall
entries: As a reaction when the squirrel passes within 5 feet of a climbable vertical surface while falling, it climbs onto the surface, arresting its fall and taking no damage.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire red squirrel takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Zig-Zag
entries: The first time each turn that a creature ends its movement within 5 feet of the squirrel, it may move up to 10 feet without provoking attacks of opportunity.

trait.name: Skittish
entries: A creature within 30 feet of the squirrel that is hidden from it must make a new stealth check at the beginning of each of its turns to remain hidden from it.

action.name: Scolding Alarm
entries: The squirrel chirps forth a complex alarm signal. Each creature that the squirrel can see ceases to be hidden from any creature that can hear the squirrel.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire giant squid takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Bioluminescent Strobe
entries: Whenever the squid takes 15 or more damage from a  single source, each creature within 5 feet of it must succeed on a DC 19 Constitution saving throw or be blinded until the end of the squid's next turn. If the squid is in total Darkness, this radius is instead 15 feet.

trait.name: Boneless
entries: The squid can move through a space as narrow as 1 feet wide without squeezing.

action.name: Multiattack

action.name: Poison Beak

If the target has an exoskeleton or shell, it must succeed on a DC 19 Contitution saving throw or be poisoned until the until the end of the squid's next turn.

action.name: Tentacles
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +11 to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. Hit: 23 (4d8 + 7) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it is grappled (escape DC 19). If the squid has only one creature grappled, the creature is restrained.

reaction.name: Ink Cloud (1/Day)
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 64 hit points while underwater, the squid exudes a 20-foot-radius cloud of ink around itself. The area is heavily obscured for 1 minute, although a significant current can disperse the ink.
As part of this reaction, the squid may move up to half its speed without provoking attacks of opportunity.

trait.name: Web-Dweller
entries: The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings and across webs, without penalty.
While in contact with a web, the spider knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The spider makes two attacks with its legs, one of which it may replace with a bite attack or a use of its web ability.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 19 (3d10 + 4) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 28 (4d12 + 4) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but poisoned for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is paralyzed while poisoned in this way.

action.name: Legs
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hits: 16 (3d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 15).

action.name: Web (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The spider launches webbing in a 10 foot radius within 60 feet. Each creature in the area must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or be restrained by webbing. As an action, the restrained target can make a DC 15 Strength check, freeing itself on a success. The webbing can also be attacked and destroyed (AC 10; hp 5; vulnerability to fire damage; immunity to bludgeoning, poison, and psychic damage).

bonus.name: Bind
entries: The spider may use its webbing to restrain a grappled or prone target (escape DC 15). If the target is Medium or smaller, the spider may then attach the creature to its back as part of this action.

trait.name: Braille
entries: The cobra's eyes are covered by transparent scales that protect them from harm. It has disadvantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight, and advantage on saving throws to avoid being blinded.

action.name: Multiattack

action.name: Threat Display (Recharge 5-6)

reaction.name: Crush

reaction.name: Bluff Strike
entries: As a reaction to a creature entering the cobra's reach, it may force the creature to succeed on a DC 19 Wisdom saving throw or be forced to immediately move 10 ft. away from the cobra, if it can.

entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (3d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it is grappled (escape DC 14). If the octopus has only one creature grappled, the creature is restrained.

action.name: Fling
entries: One creature grappled by the octopus is thrown up to 20 feet. If a thrown target strikes a solid surface, the target takes 24 (4d10 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is thrown at another creature, that creature must succeed on a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw or take the same damage.

action.name: Blanket (Recharge 6)
entries: Each creature in a 10 ft. radius sphere must succeed on a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw or be grappled and pulled up to 5 ft. toward the octopus. A creature without a swim speed makes this save at disadvantage.

reaction.name: Ink Cloud (1/Day)
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 26 hit points while underwater, the octopus exudes a 20-foot-radius cloud of ink around itself. The area is heavily obscured for 1 minute, although a significant current can disperse the ink. After releasing the ink, the octopus can use the Dash or Hide action as a bonus action.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire capuchin takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Underfoot
entries: The capuchin can take the Dodge or Hide action as a bonus action if it is within 5 feet of at least two Medium or larger hostile creatures, even if it is not obscured.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. 0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d8 + 2) piercing damage.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire megalania monitor takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Cold Blooded
entries: If the monitor takes 5 or more Cold damage, its speed is reduced by 10 until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Poison Sensitivity
entries: If the monitor has a creature grappled and takes 5 or more Poison damage, it immediately releases its grapple.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d10 + 3) piercing damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 13).

action.name: Claws
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d8 + 3) slashing damage and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

action.name: Tail Thrash
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target the monitor isn't grappling. Hit: 11 (2d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage. On a hit or miss, if the monitor has a creature grappled, the creature takes 15 (3d8 + 3) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Drop Tail (1/Day)
entries: As a reaction to being hit with an attack, the monitor reduces the attack's damage to 0.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire tegu takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Cold Blooded
entries: If the tegu takes Cold damage, its speed is reduced by 10 until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Poison Sensitivity
entries: If the tegu has a creature grappled and takes Poison damage, it immediately releases its grapple.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d8 + 2) piercing damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 12).

action.name: Tail Thrash
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +4 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (2d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage. On a hit or miss, if the tegu has a creature grappled, the creature takes 4 (1d4 + 2).

reaction.name: Drop Tail (1/Day)
entries: As a reaction to being hit with an attack, the tegu reduces the attack's damage to 0.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire short-faced hyena takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Rampage
entries: When the hyena reduces a creature to 0 hit points on its turn, the hyena can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a bite attack.

trait.name: Opportunist
entries: The hyena has advantage on attack rolls against a creature unless that creature hit it with a melee attack since the end of the hyena's last turn.

action.name: Latching Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (3d8 + 4) piercing damage. Instead of dealing damage, the hyena can grapple the target (escape DC 14).

action.name: Crush Bones
entries: One creature grappled by the hyena takes 39 (7d10 + 4) piercing damage and must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or suffer disadvantage on attack rolls and saving throws that use Strength until it completes a short or long rest.

reaction.name: Giggling Retreat
entries: As a reaction to being hit with a melee attack, the hyena moves up to 10 ft. without provoking attacks of opportunity, emitting an unsettling laugh. The attacker must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or be unable to move closer to the hyena this turn.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire spotted hyena takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Opportunist
entries: The hyena has advantage on attack rolls against a creature unless that creature hit it with a melee attack since the end of the hyena's last turn.

action.name: Latching Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (3d6 + 2) piercing damage. Instead of dealing damage, the hyena can grapple the target (escape DC 12).

action.name: Crush Bones
entries: One creature grappled by the hyena takes 27 (5d10 + 2) piercing damage and must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or suffer disadvantage on attack rolls and saving throws that use Strength until it completes a short or long rest.

reaction.name: Giggling Retreat
entries: As a reaction to being hit with a melee attack, the hyena moves up to 10 ft. without provoking attacks of opportunity, emitting an unsettling laugh. The attacker must succeed on a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw or be unable to move closer to the hyena this turn.

entries: When the dire giant hawk takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

entries: The hawk has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Air Superiority
entries: If the hawk descended at least 60 ft. this turn, it may Dash or Disengage as a Bonus Action.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hawk makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its talons.

action.name: Beak
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 25 (4d10 + 5) piercing damage.

action.name: Talons
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (4d8 + 5) slashing damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is grappled (escape DC 16).

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire riding goat takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Inspiring Obstinacy
entries: Friendly creatures within 10 ft. of the goat add 1d4 to saving throws against being charmed.

trait.name: Pushy
entries: If the goat moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target is pushed 5 ft. away. If it is pushed into a wall or other solid surface, the creature takes an additional 19 (4d8 + 3) damage.

trait.name: Sure-Footed
entries: The goat has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it prone.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The goat attacks once with its bite and once with its ram.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d8 + 3) piercing damage.

action.name: Ram
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Kick
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., 1 target. Hit: 15 (3d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Head Whip (Recharge 6)
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., 1 target. Hit: 15 (2d12 + 3) bludgeoning damage and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of the giraffe's next turn.

reaction.name: Fend off
entries: The giraffe may make a kick attack as a reaction to a creature entering its reach.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire giraffe takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire spiny toad takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The toad can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: The toad's long jump is up to 10 ft. and its high jump is up to 5 ft., with or without a running start.

trait.name: Poisonous
entries: A creature that hits the toad with a melee attack using Natural Weapons takes 24 (3d12 + 3) poison damage. If this damage reduces the toad to 0 hit points, the attacker must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d12 + 3) piercing damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 13). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the toad can't bite another target.

action.name: Tongue
entries: One Large or smaller creature within 20 ft must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be pulled up to 15 ft towards the toad, which can use a bonus action to make a bite attack against it.

action.name: Swallow
entries: The toad makes one bite attack against a Medium or smaller target it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target is swallowed, and the grapple ends. The swallowed target is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the frog, and it takes 28 (5d10 + 3) acid damage at the start of each of the frog's turns. The frog can have only one target swallowed at a time. If the frog dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse using 5 feet of movement, exiting prone.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire polypheme frog takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The frog can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: The frog's long jump is up to 20 feet and its high jump is up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d8 + 2) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 12). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the frog can't bite another target.

action.name: Tongue
entries: One Large or smaller creature within 15 ft must succeed on a DC 12 Strength saving throw or be pulled up to 10 ft towards the frog, which can use a bonus action to make a bite attack against it.

action.name: Swallow
entries: The frog makes one bite attack against a Small or smaller target it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target is swallowed, and the grapple ends. The swallowed target is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the frog, and it takes 18 (4d8 + 2) acid damage at the start of each of the frog's turns. The frog can have only one target swallowed at a time. If the frog dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse using 5 feet of movement, exiting prone.

reaction.name: Jumpy
entries: As a reaction to being targeted with a melee attack, the frog may impose disadvantage on the attack. If the attack misses, the frog may jump up to 20 ft. without provoking attacks of opportunity.

name: Dire War Elephant
resist: piercing damage from nonmagical ranged attacks

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire war elephant takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Trampling Charge
entries: The elephant may move through the space of a Large or smaller creature without penalty. When the elephant enters a creature's space, the creature must succeed on a DC 18 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

trait.name: Spear Maddened
entries: Whenever the elephant takes damage from a spear, glaive, pike, or similar long, bladed weapon, it must make a DC 18 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save the elephant attacks a random creature in range on its following turn.

trait.name: Howdah
entries: Up to four Medium or Small creatures may ride the elephant.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The elephant makes two attacks; one with its bladed tusks and one with its stomp, if available.

action.name: Bladed Tusks
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 32 (5d10 + 7) slashing damage and the target is pushed 10 ft. away.

action.name: Stomp
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one prone creature. Hit: 31 (4d12 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Tusk Sweep (Recharge 5-6)
entries: Each creature in a 15 ft. cone must succeed on a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw or take 32 (5d10 + 7) slashing damage be pushed 10 ft. away, or take half as much damage on a success.

name: Dire Bald Eagle
languages: understands Common And Auran but can't speak

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire bald eagle takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Keen Sight
entries: The eagle has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Dive Attack
entries: If the eagle is flying and dives at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a melee weapon attack, the attack scores a critical on an 19, or 20.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The eagle makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its talons.

action.name: Beak
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage.

action.name: Talons
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage. On a critical hit, the target is blinded until the end of the eagle's next turn.

trait.name: Dire Rage

entries: Creatures friendly to the climbdog that can see it add 1d4 to saving throws against being frightened.

trait.name: Plummeting Strike
entries: If the climbdog falls at least 10 feet and lands in another creature's space, that creature must succeed on a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw or be knocked prone and take 1d6 (1d4 + 4) for each 10 feet the climbdog fell, or move to the nearest unoccupied space on a success.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The climbdog makes two attacks with its Snarling bite and takes the Help action, if available.

action.name: Snarling Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage. Instead of dealing damage, the climbdog can grapple the target (escape DC 14).

action.name: Worry
entries: One creature grappled by both the climbdog and at least one of the climbdog's allies must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or fall prone and take 39 (7d10 + 4) piercing damage, or half as much on a success.

reaction.name: Disperse Shock
entries: As a reaction when the climbdog or a creature riding it would take any fall damage, the climbdog reduces that damage to 0.

trait.name: Dire Rage

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell

entries: Creatures friendly to the mastiff that can see it add 1d4 to saving throws against being frightened.

action.name: Multiattack

action.name: Bite

action.name: Worry
entries: One creature grappled by both the mastiff and at least one of the mastiff's allies must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or fall prone and take 22 (4d10 + 2) piercing damage, or half as much on a success.

reaction.name: Elusive Sidle

reaction.name: Twist Antlers
entries: As a reaction to being missed with a melee weapon attack, the moose forces the attacker to succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or drop its weapon. If it cannot, the creature is instead knocked prone.

trait.name: Dire Rage

action.name: Nibble

reaction.name: Skittish Sidle
entries: As a reaction to a creature ending its movement within 5 ft. of the hart, the pudu moves up to 10 ft. without provoking attacks of opportunity.

reaction.name: Scuttle

entries: When the dire spider crab takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

entries: While submerged in a body of water, the crab can detect the presence and location of creatures in that water within 60 ft.

reaction.name: Scuttle
entries: As a reaction to being forced to make a saving throw against a spell or magical effect, the crab moves up to 10 ft. If this movement puts the crab out of range or area of the spell or magical effect, the crab is unaffected.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire fiddler crab takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Chemoreception
entries: While submerged in a body of water, the crab can detect the presence and location of creatures in that water within 60 ft.

trait.name: Pinch
entries: When the crab takes the Help action to grant an attack advantage against a target within 5 ft. that is Concentrating, the target must make a DC 10 Concentration check.

action.name: Claw
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (2d3) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Wave
entries: The crab raises its claw, waving it to attract attention. Each creature that can see the crab subtracts 6 (2d6) from Wisdom (Perception) checks that it makes to perceive creatures other than the crab on its following turn.

reaction.name: Scuttle
entries: As a reaction to being forced to make a saving throw against a spell or magical effect, the crab moves up to 5 ft. If this movement puts the crab out of range or area of the spell or magical effect, the crab is unaffected.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire giant bull takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Trampling Charge
entries: If the bull moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 20 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the bull can make one attack with its hooves against it as a bonus action.

trait.name: Reckless Follow-Through
entries: At the start of its turn, the bull can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls during that turn. If it misses with an attack this turn, it is stunned until the beginning of its next turn.

action.name: Gore
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 36 (4d12 + 8) piercing damage.

action.name: Hooves
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 26 (3d12 + 8) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Thrashing Horns
entries: Two creatures on opposite sides of the bull must each succeed on a DC 20 Dexterity saving throw or take 56 (6d12 + 8) piercing damage and be pushed 10 feet away, or half as much damage on a success.

reaction.name: Gouging Toss
entries: As a reaction to a creature moving within 5 ft. of it, the bull forces the creature to succeed on a DC 20 Strength saving throw or take 38 (5d12 + 8) piercing damage and be knocked prone.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire king lion takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The lion has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the lion's allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

trait.name: Stalking Pounce
entries: If the lion is hidden from each hostile creature, it may Dash as a Bonus Action.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The lion makes two melee attacks, one of which may be with its throat-ripper bite.

action.name: Throat-Ripper Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (3d10 + 6) piercing damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 17). A creature already grappled by the lion takes an additional 30 (4d12 + 6) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 18 (3d8 + 6) slashing damage and the target must succeed on a DC 17 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

bonus.name: Daunting Roar (Recharge 5-6)
entries: As a Bonus Action, the lion lets out a menacing roar. Each hostile creature within 30 feet must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened of the lion until the end of the lion's next turn.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire lynx takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Righting Reflex
entries: The lynx takes no fall damage if it falls from a height of 30 ft. or greater.

trait.name: Stalking Pounce
entries: If the lynx is hidden from each hostile creature, it may Dash as a Bonus Action. If the lynx hits a creature with a claw attack on the same turn, the target must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 20 (3d10 + 5) piercing damage. The lynx may make this attack as a Bonus Action against a prone target.

action.name: Claw
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (3d8 + 5) slashing damage.

reaction.name: Bat Away
entries: As a reaction to being hit with a melee attack, the lynx forces the attacker to succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or have one object it is holding knocked out of its hands and 15 ft. away.

reaction.name: Cruel Jest
entries: As a reaction when a Medium or smaller creature attempts to leave the lynx's reach, the lynx may force it to make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or be dragged 5 feet back towards the lynx. If the creature fails this save by 5 or more, this ability does not use the lynx's reaction.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire grand old boar takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Earth Scenting
entries: The boar has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell. It can sense the type, number, and direction of underground plants and animals within 25 ft. of it.

trait.name: Ploughing Charge
entries: If the boar moves at least 20 ft. in a straight line, it may move through the space of any Large or smaller creature.
When the boar enters a creature's space, the creature must succeed on a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw or be knocked prone, or move to the nearest unoccupied space on a success.

action.name: Tusks
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (3d8 + 4) slashing damage. A prone creature takes an additional 24 (4d10 + 4) piercing damage.

action.name: Rooting Rush (Recharge 6)
entries: The boar moves up to half its speed, dragging its tusks through the ground, then flings them forward. Each creature in a 15 ft. cone must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or take 34 (5d12 + 4) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone, or take half as much damage on a success.
The ground the boar passed over with this movement becomes difficult terrain.

reaction.name: Foaming Defiance
entries: As a reaction to taking damage that would reduce it to 0 hit points, the boar makes a DC 14 Constitution saving throw. On a success, the boar is instead reduced to 1 hit point.
If triggered by piercing damage or a critical hit, this saving throw is made at disadvantage.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire teacup pig takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Earth Scenting
entries: The pig has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell. It can sense the type, number, and direction of underground plants and animals within 25 ft. of it.

action.name: Distracting Nudge
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. 0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: The target subtracts 1d4 from the next Dexterity or Wisdom saving throw it makes before the beginning of the pig's next turn.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire swarm of bees takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny insect. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

trait.name: Smoke Torpor
entries: If exposed to smoke, the swarm of bees becomes indifferent to all hostile creatures.

trait.name: Apiphobia
entries: A creature that starts its turn in the swarm's space must succeed on a DC 11 Wisdom saving throw or use all of its movement to move in a straight line before taking an action. If this movement is arrested by a solid surface, the creature falls prone and ends its turn.

action.name: Stings (swarm has more than half HP)
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +3 to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the swarm's space. Hit: 17 (4d8 + 1) piercing damage plus 17 (4d8 + 1) poison damage. If this damage causes a creature to make a saving throw to maintain concentration, it does so at disadvantage.

action.name: Stings (swarm has half HP or less)
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +3 to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the swarm's space. Hit: 13 (3d8 + 1) piercing damage plus 13 (3d8 + 1) poison damage. If this damage causes a creature to make a saving throw to maintain concentration, it does so at disadvantage.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire wasp takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Smoke Torpor
entries: If exposed to smoke, the swarm of bees becomes indifferent to all hostile creatures.

trait.name: Dimunitive
entries: The bee can occupy another creature's space and vice versa.

trait.name: Apiphobia
entries: A creature that starts its turn in the bee's space must succeed on a DC 11 Wisdom saving throw or use all of its movement to move in a straight line before taking an action. If this movement is arrested by a solid surface, the creature falls prone and ends its turn.

action.name: Sting
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +3 to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the swarm's space. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) plus 13 (3d8 + 1) poison damage. If this damage causes a creature to make a saving throw to maintain concentration, it does so at disadvantage.

reaction.name: Dimunitive Dodge
entries: As a reaction to being missed with an attack, the bee causes the attack to hit another creature in its space, using the same attack roll.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire giant bear takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Concussive Strength
entries: A creature knocked prone by the bear must succeed on a DC 19 Constitution saving throw or be unable to stand on its following turn.

trait.name: Rear Up
entries: The bear may use 30 ft. of its movement to stand upright until the end of its turn. While standing, the bear has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks and attacks made with its claws, and cannot attack with its bite.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The bear makes three claw attacks, one of which it may replace with its bite or a use of its bluff charge, if available.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 27 (4d10 + 7) piercing damage. This attack does an additional 31 (4d12 + 7) damage to a prone creature.

action.name: Claws
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 23 (4d8 + 7) slashing damage and the target must succeed on a DC 19 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

action.name: Bluff Charge (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The bear moves up to its speed towards a creature. Each creature within 10 ft. of where it ends this movement must succeed on a DC 19 Wisdom saving throw or fall prone and be frightened until the end of the bear's next turn.

reaction.name: Run Down
entries: As a reaction to a hostile creature the bear can see ending its movement at least 20 ft. further from the bear than it started, the bear moves up to its speed towards the creature.
If the bear ends this movement within 5 ft. of the creature, the creature must succeed on a DC 19 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire doombat takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Keen Hearing
entries: The bat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.

trait.name: Light-Averse
entries: The bat has disadvantage on attacks targeting any creature carrying a source of Bright Light.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The bat makes two attacks with its Barbtail Lash, one of which it may replace with a use of its Bite or its Echolocation.

action.name: Vicious Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (3d8 + 4) piercing damage. This attack scores a critical on a 19-20.

action.name: Barbtail Lash
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d10 + 4) piercing damage.

action.name: Echolocation
entries: If the bat is not deafened, it gains one of the following benefits until the end of its next turn:

items.name: Low Frequency
entries: The bat gains Blindsight to a range of 60 feet.

items.name: High Frequency
entries: The bat has advantage on melee attack rolls. Whenever the bat uses its Chaotic Swerve and the triggering attack misses it, the bat regains its reaction.

items.name: Sonic Assault
entries: At the end of the bat's turn, each nonbat creature within 30 feet that can hear it must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be deafened until the end of the bat's next turn and lose concentration, if it was concentrating.

reaction.name: Chaotic Swerve
entries: As a reaction when the bat is targeted with an attack, it may move 10 feet directly toward the nearest creature that is not riding it and impose disadvantage on the attack roll.
Then, if one or more creatures that are not riding it are within 5 feet of the bat, the bat and each creature within 5 feet of it must succeed on a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw or fall prone.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire deep bat takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Keen Hearing
entries: The bat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.

trait.name: Hematophage
entries: While a creature poisoned by its Bloodletting Bite is within 5 feet of it, the bat may lap up its spilled blood as a Bonus Action, gaining 5 temporary hit points.

action.name: Bloodletting Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for the next minute.
A creature poisoned in this way repeats this saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success or losing 19 (4d8 + 3) hit points on a failure.

action.name: Echolocation
entries: If the bat is not deafened, it gains one of the following benefits until the end of its next turn:

items.name: Low Frequency
entries: The bat gains Blindsight to a range of 60 feet.

items.name: High Frequency
entries: The bat has advantage on melee attack rolls. Whenever the bat uses its Chaotic Swerve and the triggering attack misses it, the bat regains its reaction.

reaction.name: Chaotic Swerve
entries: As a reaction when the bat is targeted with an attack, it may move 5 feet directly toward the nearest creature and impose disadvantage on the attack roll.
Then, if one or more creatures are within 5 feet of it, the bat and each creature within 5 feet of it must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or fall prone.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire badger takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The badger has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Ornery
entries: The badger does not die or fall unconscious due to dropping to 0 HP if it was attacked by a hostile creature since the end of its previous turn. If the badger starts its turn with 0 HP without having been attacked since the end of its previous turn, it dies.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) piercing damage.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire giant axe beak takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The axe beak has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the axe beak's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

trait.name: Vicious
entries: The axe beak scores a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20.

trait.name: Burst of Speed (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The axe beak may dash as a bonus action.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The axe beak makes one attack with its beak and two with its kick.

action.name: Beak
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 30 (4d12 + 6) slashing damage. A prone creature takes an additional 24 (3d12 + 6) damage to a prone target.

action.name: Kick
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 22 (4d8 + 6) piercing damage. On a critical hit, the target is knocked prone.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire hinscourge anteater takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The anteater has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Bristle-Tail Shade
entries: The anteater has advantage on saving throws against effects that deal radiant damage.

trait.name: Tunneler
entries: The anteater can burrow through solid rock at half its burrow speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The anteater makes two attacks with its Balled Claw Fist, or makes three attacks with its Vacuum Tongue Flick.
If the anteater is using its Threatening Pose, it may instead make two attacks with its Earthgouge Claws.

action.name: Balled Claw Fist
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (3d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage.
On a hit or miss, the target must succeed on a DC 17 Strength saving throw or fall prone.

action.name: Stonecutter Claws
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 30 (4d12 + 6) slashing damage.
This attack is made at disadvantage against any creature not grappled by the anteater.

action.name: Vacuum Tongue Flick
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +9 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 6) slashing damage and the target is pulled up to 10 feet toward the anteater.
The target gains no benefit from cover or obscurement against this attack, so long as an uninterrupted path exists between it and the anteater.

action.name: Bristled Sweep
entries: The anteater sweeps its tail in a 15 foot cone. Each creature in the area must succeed on a DC 17 Strength saving throw or take 36 (6d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage and be pushed up to 15 feet away.

bonus.name: Threatening Pose
entries: The anteater rears on its hind legs and spreads its arms. Until the anteater lowers itself as a bonus action or falls prone, its speed is reduced to 0.

bonus.name: Suck Up
entries: Each Small or smaller creature within 10 feet of the anteater that it hit with its Vacuum Tongue Flick this turn must succeed on a DC 17 Strength saving throw or be Swallowed (escape DC 17).
A creature swallowed in this way takes 24 (3d12 + 6) bludgeoning damage at the beginning of each of the anteater's turns.

reaction.name: Clumsy Tumble
entries: As a reaction when a creature hits the anteater with a melee attack, the anteater forces the creature to reroll the attack, taking the second result, then falls prone.

reaction.name: Perilous Hug
entries: As a reaction when a creature makes a melee attack against the anteater while the anteater is using its Threatening Pose, the anteater forces the attacker to succeed on a DC 17 Strength saving throw or be grappled (escape DC 17).

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire giant anteater takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The anteater has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Bristle-Tail Shade
entries: The anteater has advantage on saving throws against effects that deal radiant damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The anteater makes two attacks with its Balled Claw Fist.
If the anteater is using its Threatening Pose, it may instead make two attacks with its Earthgouge Claws.

action.name: Balled Claw Fist
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Earthgouge Claws
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 20 (3d10 + 5) slashing damage.
This attack is made at disadvantage against any creature not grappled by the anteater.

action.name: Sticky Tongue Pluck
entries: One creature within 5 feet must succeed on a DC 15  Dexterity saving throw or have one item it is carrying that weighs 1 lb or less stolen by the anteater.

action.name: Threatening Pose
entries: The anteater rears on its hind legs and spreads its arms. Until the anteater lowers itself as a bonus action or falls prone, its speed is reduced to 0.

reaction.name: Clumsy Tumble
entries: As a reaction when a creature hits the anteater with a melee attack, the anteater forces the creature to reroll the attack, taking the second result, then falls prone.

reaction.name: Perilous Hug
entries: As a reaction when a creature makes a melee attack against the anteater while the anteater is using its Threatening Pose, the anteater forces the attacker to succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be grappled (escape DC 15).

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire ant-bear anteater takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The anteater has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Bristle-Tail Shade
entries: The anteater has advantage on saving throws against effects that deal radiant damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: If the anteater is standing with its Threatening Pose, it makes two attacks with its Earthgouge Claws.

action.name: Earthgouge Claws
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.
This attack is made at disadvantage against any creature not grappled by the anteater.

action.name: Sticky Tongue Pluck
entries: One creature within 5 feet must succeed on a DC 13  Dexterity saving throw or have one item it is carrying that weighs 1 lb or less stolen by the anteater.

action.name: Threatening Pose
entries: The anteater rears on its hind legs and spreads its arms. Until the anteater lowers itself as a bonus action or falls prone, its speed is reduced to 0.

reaction.name: Clumsy Tumble
entries: As a reaction when a creature hits the anteater with a melee attack, the anteater forces the creature to reroll the attack, taking the second result, then falls prone.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire silky anteater takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The anteater has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Prehensile Tail
entries: If the anteater falls prone while climbing, it may make a DC 11 Strength (Athletics) check. On a success, the anteater catches itself and does not fall.

action.name: Nestripper Claws
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1).

action.name: Sticky Tongue Pluck
entries: One creature within 5 feet must succeed on a DC 11  Dexterity saving throw or have one item it is carrying that weighs 1 lb or less stolen by the anteater.

reaction.name: Clumsy Tumble
entries: As a reaction when a creature hits the anteater with a melee attack, the anteater forces the creature to reroll the attack, taking the second result, then falls prone.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire giant ant queen takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Spiracle Breathing
entries: The ant has disadvantage on Constitution saving throws against inhaled toxins.

trait.name: Chemical Communication
entries: Each other ant within 120 ft. is aware of the number and type of creatures that the ant can see.

trait.name: In the Presence of the Queen
entries: Each other ant within 30 ft. has advantage on attack rolls and Wisdom saving throws.

action.name: Mandibles
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 16 (3d8 + 4) piercing damage plus 40 (6d12 + 4) poison damage.

action.name: Queen's Command
entries: Up to two friendly ants within 60 ft. may each move up to 20 ft. and make a melee attack.

action.name: Pheromonic Control (Recharge 5-6)
entries: One creature within 15 ft. of the queen must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or be charmed by the queen for the next minute.
A charmed creature repeates this saving throw at the end of its turns and whenever it takes damage, ending the effect on a success.

reaction.name: Call To Arms (3/Day)
entries: As a reaction to taking damage, the queen calls two soldier ants to burrow up from the earth, each appearing in an unoccupied space the queen can see within 60 ft.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire giant phragmotic ant takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Spiracle Breathing
entries: The ant has disadvantage on Constitution saving throws against inhaled toxins.

trait.name: Chemical Communication
entries: Each other ant within 120 ft. is aware of the number and type of creatures that the ant can see.

trait.name: Shield-Head
entries: The ant grants half cover against ranged attacks to creatures behind it.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ant makes two attacks, one of which it may replace with a use of its lower head ability.

action.name: Mandibles
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 16 (3d8 + 4) piercing damage.

action.name: Headbutt (Recharge 5-6)
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 19 (3d10 + 4) bludgeoning damage and the target musts succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

action.name: Lower Head
entries: The ant lowers its head, increasing its AC by 2 until the beginning of its following turn. Each hostile must spend two feet of movement for every foot it moves through the ant's reach.

reaction.name: Hive Frenzy
entries: As a reaction to a friendly creature within 60 ft. being reduced to 0 hit points, the ant moves up to 10 ft. towards it.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire giant soldier ant takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Spiracle Breathing
entries: The ant has disadvantage on Constitution saving throws against inhaled toxins.

trait.name: Chemical Communication
entries: Each other ant within 120 ft. is aware of the number and type of creatures that the ant can see.

trait.name: Death Throes
entries: When the ant dies, it explodes in a burst of acid. Each creature within 5 feet of it must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or take 27 (4d12 + 3) acid damage.

action.name: Mandibles
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 15 (3d8 + 3) piercing damage.

action.name: Acid Spray (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The ant sprays acid in a 15 ft. cone. Each creature in the area must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw  take 33 (5d12 + 3) acid damage.

reaction.name: Hive Frenzy
entries: As a reaction to a friendly creature within 60 ft. being reduced to 0 hit points, the ant moves up to 10 ft. towards it.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire giant worker ant takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the creature takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, its hit points are reduced to 0. If the creature takes damage from another effect, it dies if the damage equals or exceeds its hit point maximum, otherwise it takes no damage.

trait.name: Spiracle Breathing
entries: The ant has disadvantage on Constitution saving throws against inhaled toxins.

trait.name: Chemical Communication
entries: Each other ant within 120 ft. is aware of the number and type of creatures that the ant can see.

action.name: Mandibles (Group Attack)
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2).

reaction.name: Hive Frenzy
entries: As a reaction to another ant within 60 ft. being reduced to 0 hit points, the ant moves up to 10 ft. towards it.

trait.name: Dire Rage
trait.description: When the dire tarantula takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Web-Dweller
entries: The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings and across webs, without penalty.
While in contact with a web, the spider knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2).

action.name: Defensive Posture
entries: The spider rears up in a defensive posture. Until the beginning of its next turn, a creature that attempts to enter its space must first make a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw.
On a failed save, the creature is Frightened until the beginning of its next turn.

action.name: Urticating Hairs (1/Day)
entries: The spider scrapes off some of its barbed bristles and flings them toward a creature within 5 feet.
The target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be Blinded for the next minute (Save Ends at end of turn) or until it takes an action to clear its eyes.

reaction.name: Crushed Vengeance
entries: When the spider is reduced to 0 hit points by a melee attack, it can make a Bite attack with advantage against the attacker.

trait.name: Dire Rage
trait.description: When the dire kyoka takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Retract Head
entries: As a Bonus Action, the kyoka may retract its limbs and head into its shell and end its turn. Until the beginning of its next turn, the kyoka's AC is increased to 19 and it can't take reactions.

trait.name: Laborious Rocking
entries: When the kyoka attempts to stand from prone, it must make a DC 15 Strength (Athletics) check in addition to spending half its movement, remaining prone on a failure.

action.name: Jagged Snap
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit:33 (4d12 + 5) piercing damage.

If the target is wielding a nonmagical weapon made of wood or other organic material, instead of dealing damage the kyoka may bite the weapon, giving it a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to hit as the kyoka bites part of it off.

action.name: Push Onward
entries: Until the end of its turn, the kyoka may move through the space of any Large or smaller creature. A creature whose space the kyoka enters is pushed to an unoccupied space of its choice within 5 feet.

action.name: Obstinate Plant
entries: Until the beginning of its next turn, the kyoka gains advantage on Strength checks and saving throws, and a Gargantuan creature that attempts to move through its space must succeed on DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or fall prone.

trait.name: Dire Rage
trait.description: When the dire baby kyoka takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Retract Head
entries: As a Bonus Action, the kyoka may retract its limbs and head into its shell and end its turn. Until the beginning of its next turn, the kyoka's AC is increased to 18 and it can't take reactions.

trait.name: Laborious Rocking
entries: When the kyoka attempts to stand from prone, it must make a DC 10 Strength (Athletics) check in addition to spending half its movement, remaining prone on a failure.

action.name: Jagged Nip
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. 0 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target wielding a weapon made of wood or other organic material. Hit:The kyoka attaches to the weapon.

While attached, attacks with the weapon are made at disadvantage and the kyoka is dragged with the weapon until it releases its bite as a Bonus Action. A creature may attempt to remove the kyoka as an action with a DC 10 Strength (Athletics) check.

action.name: Obstinate Plant
entries: Until the beginning of its next turn, the kyoka gains advantage on Strength checks and saving throws, and a Medium or Large creature that attempts to move through its space must succeed on DC 10 Dexterity saving throw or fall prone.

trait.name: Dire Rage
trait.description: When the dire millipede takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Desiccation Weakness
entries: Whenever the millipede takes any fire or necrotic damage, it gains a level of exhaustion.

trait.name: Thousand-Legged Writhe
entries: The millipede ignores the effects of difficult terrain, and has advantage on checks and saving throws against any effect that would reduce its speed.

action.name: Crawling Clutch
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: The millipede becomes attached to the target (remove DC 10).

action.name: Ozopore Secretion (1/Day)
entries: The millipede secretes a foul oil that coats its body.
