For the next minute, a creature that hits the millipede with a melee attack or starts its turn in the millipede's space must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the beginning of its next turn.

bonus.name: Armored Coil
entries: The millipede coils into a tight spiral, gaining the following effects until it uses an action to uncurl:

• The millipede's AC is increased to 15.
  • The millipede's speed is reduced to 0.

trait.name: Dire Rage
trait.description: When the dire hercules beetle takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Careening Flight
entries: When the beetle begins flying, it must choose a direction to fly in, and must use all of its movement on each of its turns to fly in that direction until it lands or collides with a creature or object.

trait.name: Spiracle Breathing
entries: The beetle has disadvantage on Constitution saving throws against inhaled toxins.

action.name: Huffy Pinch
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) and the beetle becomes attached to the target (remove DC 10).

action.name: Heroic Lift
entries: The beetle attempts to grasp a Medium or smaller creature with its horns and flip it, forcing the target to succeed on a DC 10 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

reaction.name: Redeploy Wings
entries: When the beetle begins to fall, it can make a DC 10 Strength saving throw. On a success, the beetle falls only 5 feet before catching itself in the air.

trait.name: Dire Rage
trait.description: When the dire cervus beetle takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Careening Flight
entries: When the beetle begins flying, it must choose a direction to fly in, and must use all of its movement on each of its turns to fly in that direction until it lands or collides with a creature or object.

trait.name: Spiracle Breathing
entries: The beetle has disadvantage on Constitution saving throws against inhaled toxins.

action.name: Oaksplitter Mandibles
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 20 (3d10 + 5) slashing damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 15).

action.name: Tactical Collision
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 25 (5d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage and the beetle falls prone.

action.name: Behemoth Lift
entries: The beetle attempts to grasp a Gargantuan or smaller creature with its horns and flip it, forcing the target to succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or take 35 (6d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone.
A creature grappled by the beetle makes this saving throw with disadvantage, and is freed from the grapple on a failed saving throw.

reaction.name: Redeploy Wings
entries: When the beetle begins to fall, it can make a DC 15 Strength saving throw. On a success, the beetle falls only 10 feet before catching itself in the air.

trait.name: Dire Rage
trait.description: When the dire titanshell beetle takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Careening Flight
entries: When the beetle begins flying, it must choose a direction to fly in, and must use all of its movement on each of its turns to fly in that direction until it lands or collides with a creature or object.

trait.name: Spiracle Breathing
entries: The beetle has disadvantage on Constitution saving throws against inhaled toxins.

action.name: Clearcutter Mandibles
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., up to two targets within 10 ft. of one another. Hit: 32 (5d10 + 7) slashing damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 19).

action.name: Titanstrength Launch
entries: The beetle attempts to grasp a Titanic or smaller creature within 10 feet in its horns and fling it upward, forcing it to make a DC 19 Strength saving throw.
On a failed save, a creature is thrown 100 feet into the air and does not fall until the beginning of its next turn.
A creature launched into a ceiling or other solid object takes 47 (8d10 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Topple Mountain (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The beetle pries at an object, structure, or terrain feature no larger than 40 feet to a side with its horns and rolls it over, pushing it up to 40 feet.

Each creature in the area it is pushed into must succeed on a DC 19 Dexterity saving throw or take 43 (6d12 + 7) bludgeoning damage and be restrained beneath rubble (escape DC 19), or take half as much damage on a success.

reaction.name: Redeploy Wings
entries: When the beetle begins to fall, it can make a DC 19 Strength saving throw. On a success, the beetle falls only 15 feet before catching itself in the air.

trait.name: Dire Rage
trait.description: When the dire artillery beetle takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Spiracle Breathing
entries: The beetle has disadvantage on Constitution saving throws against inhaled toxins.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The beetle makes three attacks with its Hydraulic Kick.

action.name: Hydraulic Kick
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (3d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage.
If the target is Medium or smaller, it is additionally pushed 10 feet away.

action.name: Boiling Acid Spray
entries: The beetle sprays rapid bursts of boiling acid in a 30 foot cone from its abdominal nozzle with incredible precision.
Each creature in the area of the beetle's choice must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or take 25 (4d10 + 5) acid plus 25 (4d10 + 5) fire damage, or half as much on a success.

reaction.name: Vengeful Punt
entries: When a creature hits the beetle with an opportunity attack, the beetle can make a Hydraulic Kick attack against it.

trait.name: Dire Rage
trait.description: When the dire ironclad beetle takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Delaminating Shell
entries: Whenever the beetle takes damage, it can reduce that damage to 1.
If it does, the AC provided by its Natural Armor is reduced by 1 until it completes a short or long Rest.

trait.name: Spiracle Breathing
entries: The beetle has disadvantage on Constitution saving throws against inhaled toxins.

action.name: Tarsal Grip
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: The beetle becomes attached to the target (remove DC 10).

action.name: Distracting Thump
entries: The beetle rapidly knocks its abdomen against a creature it is climbing on, which can use its reaction to attempt to remove the beetle (remove DC 10).
If the creature does not remove the beetle, attacks against the creature have advantage until the beginning of the creature's next turn.

reaction.name: Feign Death
entries: When a creature misses the beetle with an attack, the beetle can fall prone and appear to die.

trait.name: Dire Rage
trait.description: When the dire nanny beetle takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Dreadnought Shell
entries: If the beetle would take 10 or fewer bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage from a single source, it takes no damage instead.

trait.name: Spiracle Breathing
entries: The beetle has disadvantage on Constitution saving throws against inhaled toxins.

action.name: Tarsal Stomp
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Crushing Advance
entries: The beetle uses all of its remaining movement to move in a straight line, and can attempt to push one Large or smaller creature in its path, which must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be pushed ahead of the beetle for the rest of this move.
A creature pushed into a solid surface in this way takes 24 (4d10 + 4) bludgeoning damage and is restrained (escape DC 14) until the beginning of the beetle's turn, or until the beetle moves.

reaction.name: Shivering Alarm (Recharge 6)
entries: When the beetle sees a creature take a hostile action, it can scrape its legs against its shell, producing a horrid squealing sound audible out to 300 feet.
Each creature within 15 feet that can hear it has disadvantage on the first attack it makes before the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Dire Rage
trait.description: When the dire fire beetle takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Illumination
entries: The beetle sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet.

trait.name: Spiracle Breathing
entries: The beetle has disadvantage on Constitution saving throws against inhaled toxins.

action.name: Mandible Snip
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (2d8) slashing damage.

action.name: Blistering Secretion
entries: The beetle secretes a toxic oil and rubs it over its shell. For the next minute, any creature that grapples the beetle or hits it with a melee attack is coated in the oil.
Until a creature clears the oil as an action, whenever the coated creature takes piercing or slashing damage it takes an additional 1 poison damage.

reaction.name: Synchronous Flash
entries: When the beetle or a friendly creature it can see within 30 feet is targeted with an attack, the beetle can briefly intensify its natural glow in a searing flash.
The attacker subtracts 1 from its attack roll for each beetle that took this reaction.

trait.name: Dire Rage
trait.description: When the dire centipede takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Desiccation Weakness
entries: Whenever the centipede takes any fire or necrotic damage, it gains a level of exhaustion.

trait.name: Hundred-Legged Writhe
entries: The centipede ignores the effects of difficult terrain, and has advantage on attacks made against a creature that it is attached to, grappling, or grappled by.

action.name: Fleshgripper Toxicognaths
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) and the centipede becomes attached to the target (remove DC 12) until it uses this attack again.

action.name: Excruciating Venom
entries: One creature the centipede is attached to must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or take 14 (3d8 + 2) poison damage, or half as much on a success.
A creature that fails this saving throw by 5 or more is stunned until the beginning of its next turn.

trait.name: Dire Rage
trait.description: When the dire ruby-headed centipede takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Desiccation Weakness
entries: Whenever the centipede takes any fire or necrotic damage, it gains a level of exhaustion.

trait.name: Hundred-Legged Writhe
entries: The centipede ignores the effects of difficult terrain, and has advantage on attacks made against a creature that it is attached to, grappling, or grappled by.

action.name: Fleshgripper Toxicognaths
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (3d6 + 2) piercing damage and the centipede becomes attached to the target (remove DC 12) until it uses this attack again.

action.name: Spasmodic Venom
entries: The centipede pumps venom into a creature it is grappling or attached to, forcing it to succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or take 27 (5d10 + 2) poison damage, or half as much on a success.
A creature that fails this saving throw by 5 or more is paralyzed until the beginning of its next turn.

reaction.name: Skittering Thrash
entries: When the centipede is hit with a ranged attack, it can move up to half its speed directly toward the attacker.
Opportunity attacks provoked by this movement have disadvantage.

trait.name: Dire Rage
trait.description: When the dire skyfisher centipede takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Desiccation Weakness
entries: Whenever the centipede takes any fire or necrotic damage, it gains a level of exhaustion.

trait.name: Hundred-Legged Writhe
entries: The centipede ignores the effects of difficult terrain, and has advantage on attacks made against a creature that it is attached to, grappling, or grappled by.

action.name: Mandible Slice
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 19 (4d8 + 3) slashing damage.

action.name: Fleshgripper Toxicognaths
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (3d6 + 3) piercing damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 14).
If the target is Large or larger, the centipede can become attached to the target (remove DC 14) instead of grappling it.

bonus.name: Spasmodic Venom
entries: The centipede pumps venom into a creature it is grappling or attached to, forcing it to succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or take 38 (7d10 + 3) poison damage, or half as much on a success.
A creature that fails this saving throw by 5 or more is paralyzed until the beginning of its next turn.

bonus.name: Caudal Grip
entries: The centipede anchors itself with its pincer-like rear legs and coils up, gaining the following effects until the end of its next turn:

• The centipede's speed is reduced to 0.
  • The centipede has advantage on ability checks and saving throws that use Strength.
  • The centipede's melee attacks have a reach of 20 feet and advantage.

trait.name: Dire Rage
trait.description: When the dire heartstopper gigapede takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Desiccation Weakness
entries: Whenever the centipede takes any fire or necrotic damage, it gains a level of exhaustion.

trait.name: Hundred-Legged Writhe
entries: The centipede ignores the effects of difficult terrain, and has advantage on attacks made against a creature that it is attached to, grappling, or grappled by.

trait.name: Reflexive Molt (1/Day)
entries: When the gigapede fails a saving throw against an effect that does not deal damage, it can choose to succeed by rapidly shedding its exoskeleton, disgorging its soft inner body through its mouth into the nearest unoccupied space.
The exoskeleton can be attacked and destroyed (AC 16; 30 HP; vulnerability to fire damage)
Until it completes a long rest or uses its Devour Chitin, the gigapede gains vulnerability to all damage and its AC is reduced to 14.

action.name: Mandible Slice
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 25 (5d8 + 5) slashing damage.

action.name: Fleshgripper Toxicognaths
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 20 (3d10 + 5) piercing damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 17).
If the target is Huge or larger, the centipede can become attached to the target (remove DC 17) instead of grappling it.

action.name: Devour Chitin
entries: The gigapede gorges itself upon its shed exoskeleton, consuming it and regaining a use of its Reflexive Molt.
It cannot take this action while it is grappling or attached to a creature.

bonus.name: Heartstopper Venom
entries: The centipede pumps venom into a creature it is grappling or attached to, forcing it to succeed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw or take 45 (8d10 + 5) poison damage, or half as much on a success.
Then, if the creature has 20 or fewer hit points, it drops to 0 hit points.

bonus.name: Caudal Grip
entries: The centipede anchors itself with its pincer-like rear legs and coils up, gaining the following effects until the end of its next turn:

• The centipede's speed is reduced to 0.
  • The centipede has advantage on ability checks and saving throws that use Strength.
  • The centipede's melee attacks have a reach of 30 feet and advantage.

reaction.name: Skittering Thrash
entries: When the centipede is hit with a ranged attack, it can move up to half its speed directly toward the attacker.
Opportunity attacks provoked by this movement have disadvantage.

trait.name: Dire Rage
trait.description: When the dire swarm of fire beetles takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and can move through any opening large enough for a Small creature. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

trait.name: Illumination
entries: The swarm sheds bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light for an additional 30 feet.

trait.name: Spiracle Breathing
entries: The swarm has disadvantage on Constitution saving throws against inhaled toxins.

action.name: Thrash of Mandibles
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +7 to hit, reach 0 ft., one target. Hit: 48 (11d8 + 4) slashing damage or 28 (6d8 + 4) slashing damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.
If the target is wearing leather or cloth armor, the armor takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to the AC it offers. Armor reduced to an AC of 10 is destroyed.

reaction.name: Blinding Flash
entries: When the swarm takes 10 or more damage from a single source, it can briefly intensify its natural glow to blinding levels.
Each other creature within 30 feet must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or be blinded until the beginning of the swarm's next turn.

reaction.name: Blistering Tide (1/Day)
entries: When the swarm is reduced below 44 hit points, it can secrete a toxic oil. For the next minute, any creature that starts its turn in the swarm's space or hits the swarm with a melee attack is coated in the oil.
Until a creature clears the oil as an action, whenever the coated creature takes piercing or slashing damage it takes an additional 19 (3d10 + 4) poison damage.

trait.name: Dire Rage
trait.description: When the dire dragonspine millipede takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Desiccation Weakness
entries: Whenever the millipede takes any fire or necrotic damage, it gains a level of exhaustion.

trait.name: Thousand-Legged Writhe
entries: The millipede ignores the effects of difficult terrain, and has advantage on checks and saving throws against any effect that would reduce its speed.

action.name: Crawling Clutch
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: The target is grappled (escape DC 13).

action.name: Pincushion Lurch
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (3d6 + 3) piercing damage.
This attack has advantage if it targets a creature the millipede is grappling or attached to.

reaction.name: Detach Bristles
entries: When a creature hits the millipede with a melee weapon attack, it can detach a clump of its entangling bristles.
The attacker must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or have disadvantage on attacks that use that weapon until a creature uses an action to clear them.

trait.name: Dire Rage
trait.description: When the dire loamdozer millipede takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Desiccation Weakness
entries: Whenever the millipede takes any fire or necrotic damage, it gains a level of exhaustion.

trait.name: Thousand-Legged Writhe
entries: The millipede ignores the effects of difficult terrain, and has advantage on checks and saving throws against any effect that would reduce its speed.

trait.name: Tunneler
entries: The millipede can burrow through solid rock at half its burrow speed and leaves a 5-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

action.name: Crawling Clutch
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: The target is grappled (escape DC 14).
If the target is Huge or larger, the millipede can become attached to the target (remove DC 14) instead of grappling it.

action.name: Ozopore Secretion (1/Day)
entries: The millipede secretes a foul oil that coats its body.

For the next minute, a creature that hits the millipede with a melee attack or starts its turn in the millipede's space must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or take 19 (3d10 + 4) poison damage and be poisoned until the beginning of its next turn.

bonus.name: Armored Coil
entries: The millipede coils into a tight spiral, gaining the following effects until it uses an action to uncurl:

• The millipede's AC is increased to 17.
  • The millipede's speed is reduced to 0.
  • Any creature grappled by the millipede is also restrained.

trait.name: Dire Rage
trait.description: When the dire swarm of spiders takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Horrid Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and can move through any opening large enough for a Fine spider.

A creature whose space the swarm enters for the first time on a turn must succeed on a DC 11 Dexterity saving throw or fall prone. On a successful saving throw, the creature can use its reaction to move up to half its speed.

trait.name: Web-Dweller
entries: The swarm can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings and across webs, without penalty.
While in contact with a web, the swarm knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

action.name: Bites
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +3 to hit, reach 0 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing plus 21 (4d10 + 1) poison damage, or 1 piercing plus 16 (3d10 + 1) poison damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.
A creature that takes 6 or more poison damage in this way is poisoned until the end of the swarm's next turn.

action.name: Arachnophobic Terror
entries: The swarm scuttles over a prone creature in its space, forcing it to succeed on a DC 11 Wisdom saving throw or take 21 (4d10 + 1) nonlethal psychic damage and be frightened until the end of the swarm's next turn.

reaction.name: Crushed Vengeance
entries: When a creature hits the swarm with a melee attack, the swarm can deal 16 (3d10 + 1) poison damage to it.

trait.name: Dire Rage
trait.description: When the dire goliath bristle spider takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Web-Dweller
entries: The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings and across webs, without penalty.
While in contact with a web, the spider knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 10 (2d8 + 2) piercing damage.

action.name: Defensive Posture
entries: The spider rears up in a defensive posture. Until the beginning of its next turn, a creature that attempts to enter the spider's reach must first make a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw.
On a failed save, the creature is frightened until the beginning of its next turn.

action.name: Nettling Bristles (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The spider scrapes off some of its barbed bristles, ejecting them at a creature within 15 feet.
The target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or take 22 (4d10 + 2) piercing damage and be blinded until it takes an action to clear its eyes, or take half as much damage on a success.

bonus.name: Leaping Tackle
entries: The spider jumps up to 15 feet and can land in the space of any Medium or smaller creature that is frightened.
A creature whose space the spider lands in must succeed on a DC 12 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.
On a successful saving throw, the spider instead lands in the nearest unoccupied space.

trait.name: Dire Rage
trait.description: When the dire terror widow takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Web-Dweller
entries: The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings and across webs, without penalty.
While in contact with a web, the spider knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

action.name: Paralyzing Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 13 (2d10 + 3) piercing plus 27 (4d12 + 3) poison damage.
A creature reduced to 0 hit points in this way stabilizes automatically, and becomes poisoned for the next hour. While poisoned in this way, a creature is paralyzed.

action.name: Grasping Legs
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. Hit: 11 (2d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 13).

action.name: Tangleweb Launch (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The widow launches webbing in a 10 foot radius centered on a point it can see within 60 feet.

Each creature in the area must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or be restrained (escape DC 13). The webbing can be destroyed (AC 10; 5 HP; vulnerability to fire damage; immunity to bludgeoning, poison, and psychic damage).

bonus.name: Web Bind
entries: The widow attempts to wrap a grappled or prone creature within 5 feet in webbing, forcing it to succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be restrained (escape DC 13).
If the target is Medium or smaller, the widow can attach the creature to its back as part of this action.

trait.name: Dire Rage
trait.description: When the dire deathleaper takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Web-Dweller
entries: The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings and across webs, without penalty.
While in contact with a web, the spider knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The deathleaper makes two attacks, one of which can be with its Drip-Fang Bite, and uses its Death Leap, if available.

action.name: Drip-Fang Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 14 (2d10 + 4) piercing plus 28 (4d12 + 4) poison damage.
This attack scores a critical on a 19-20 against a stunned creature.

action.name: Grasping Legs
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 14).
A Large or larger creature grappled by the deathleaper has disadvantage on attacks that target it.

action.name: Death Leap (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The deathleaper jumps up to 120 feet, and can land in the space of up to one Huge or smaller creature.
A creature whose space the deathleaper lands in must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or be knocked prone and stunned until the beginning of its next turn.
On a successful saving throw, the deathleaper instead lands in the nearest unoccupied space.

bonus.name: Silk Anchor
entries: The deathleaper plants a trailing anchor of silk in its space, which lasts until it uses this ability again, moves more than 40 feet from its anchor, or its anchor is destroyed (AC 10, 5 HP).
While it is beneath its anchor, the deathleaper falls only when it chooses to and can use its climb speed to climb directly down from or back up toward the anchor.

trait.name: Dire Rage
trait.description: When the dire corpsejaw takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Adamantine Jaws
entries: The corpsejaw's bite works as if made of adamantine. The bite scores a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The corpsejaw has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Pounce
entries: If the corpsejaw moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or fall prone. If the target is prone, the corpsejaw can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit:13 (2d10 + 3) piercing damage. If the corpsejaw scores a critical hit and the target wears nonmagical armor, the armor takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to the AC it offers. Armor reduced to an AC of 10 is destroyed.

action.name: Claw
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit:9 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.

name: Dire Giant Goose
languages: understands Jotunskye and Sylvan but can't speak

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The goose makes one Beak attack and two Wing attacks.

action.name: Beak
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit:15 (3d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Wing
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit:15 (2d12 + 3) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or have the prone condition.

action.name: Thunderous Honk (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The goose honks with ear-splitting volume. Each other creature within 30 feet of the goose must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 38 (5d12 + 3) thunder damage and has the deafened condition until the start of the goose's next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage only. The honk can be heard within 300 feet.

trait.name: Dire Rage
trait.description: When the dire giant goose takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Dire Rage
trait.description: When the dire giant lynx takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Lynx's Sight (1/Day)
entries: The lynx can cast clairvoyance, requiring no spell components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability.

trait.name: Woodland Camouflage
entries: The lynx has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in undergrowth or snowy terrain.

action.name: Claws
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit:14 (2d10 + 4) slashing damage. If the lynx moved at least 20 feet straight toward the target immediately before the hit, the target must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or have the prone condition. If the target has the prone condition, the lynx can make another Claws attack against it as a bonus action.

name: Dire Giant Ox
languages: understands Jotunskye and Sylvan but can't speak

trait.name: Dire Rage
trait.description: When the dire giant ox takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Beast of Burden
entries: The ox is considered to be one size larger for the purpose of determining its carrying capacity.

action.name: Gore
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit:19 (3d8 + 7) piercing damage. If the ox moved at least 20 feet straight toward the target immediately before the hit, the target takes an extra 27 (4d10 + 7) piercing damage, and it must succeed on a DC 18 Strength saving throw or have the prone condition.

trait.name: Dire Rage
trait.description: When the dire giant ram takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The ram has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Ram
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit:14 (3d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage plus 20 (3d10 + 5) force damage. If the ram moved at least 20 feet straight toward the target immediately before the hit, the target must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or have the prone condition.

action.name: Force Bolt
entries: Ranged Spell Attack. +7 to hit, range 30 ft., one target. Hit:25 (4d10 + 5) force damage.

reaction.name: Absorbent Fleece (Recharge 6)
entries: Immediately after the ram succeeds on a saving throw against a spell or a spell's attack misses it, the ram can make one Force Bolt attack.

action.name: Proboscis
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit:16 (3d8 + 4) piercing damage, and the tick attaches to the target. While attached, the tick can't make Proboscis attacks. The tick can detach itself by spending 5 feet of its movement. As an action, a creature within reach of the tick can try to detach the tick, doing so with a successful DC 14 Strength check.

action.name: Blood Drain
entries: The tick deals 16 (3d8 + 4) necrotic damage to one creature it is physically attached to, provided that creature isn't a Construct or an Undead, or 24 (5d8 + 4) necrotic damage if the creature is a Giant. The tick regains hit points equal to the damage dealt.

trait.name: Dire Rage
trait.description: When the dire giant tick takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Dire Rage
trait.description: When the dire gigant takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Spell-Resistant Carapace
entries: The gigant has advantage on saving throws against spells, and any creature that makes a spell attack against the gigant has disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The gigant makes one Mandibles attack and two Talons attacks.

action.name: Mandibles
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +15 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. Hit:28 (5d8 + 8) slashing damage, and the target has the grappled condition (escape DC 23). Until the grapple ends, the target takes 28 (5d8 + 8) slashing damage at the start of each of the gigant's turns. While the gigant is grappling a target, it can't use Mandibles against other targets.

action.name: Talons
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +15 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit:24 (4d8 + 8) slashing damage, and the target is pulled 10 feet straight toward the gigant.

action.name: Scale Dust (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The gigant releases magical dust from its wings in a 30-foot cube. Each creature in that area must make a DC 23 Constitution saving throw, taking 80 (12d12 + 8) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. On a success or failure, the creature has the poisoned condition for 1 hour. While poisoned this way, the creature can't regain hit points.

bonus.name: Drone
entries: The gigant produces a horrid droning sound by rapidly beating its wings. Each creature within 10 feet of the gigant must succeed on a DC 23 Constitution saving throw or take 33 (5d10 + 8) thunder damage and have the incapacitated condition until the end of its next turn. The gigant can then fly up to half its flying speed.

trait.name: Dire Rage
trait.description: When the dire knifewing takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Flyby
entries: The knifewing doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

trait.name: Glider
entries: The knifewing can't ascend while flying and its altitude decreases by 5 feet for every 30 feet it flies. If flying, the knifewing falls if it doesn't fly at least 30 feet during its turn.

action.name: Knifewing (Flying Only)
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit:10 (2d8 + 2) slashing damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit:8 (2d6 + 2) piercing damage.

name: Dire Plainscow
resist: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical attacks

trait.name: Dire Rage
trait.description: When the dire plainscow takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Trampling Charge
entries: If the plainscow moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a hooves attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the plainscow can make another attack with its hooves as a bonus action.

action.name: Hooves
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit:17 (3d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Dire Rage
trait.description: When the dire ruin spider takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Ruinous Acid
entries: Any nonmagical weapon that hits the spider corrodes. After dealing damage, the weapon takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to damage rolls. If its penalty drops to -5, the weapon is destroyed. Nonmagical ammunition made of metal that hits the spider is destroyed after dealing damage.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Web Sense
entries: While in contact with a web, the spider knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

trait.name: Web Walker
entries: The spider ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The spider makes two Ruinous Bite attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Web.

action.name: Ruinous Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit:14 (2d10 + 4) piercing damage and 28 (4d12 + 4) acid damage. In addition, if the target is a creature wearing nonmagical armor, the armor takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to the AC it offers. Armor reduced to an Armor Class of 10 is destroyed.

action.name: Web (Recharge 5-6)
entries: Ranged Weapon Attack. +7 to hit, range 30/60 ft., one creature. Hit:The target has the restrained condition. As an action, a restrained target can make a DC 15 Strength check, bursting the webbing on a successful check. The webbing can also be destroyed (AC 10; 5 hit points; vulnerability to fire damage; immunity to acid, bludgeoning, poison, and psychic damage).

trait.name: Dire Rage
trait.description: When the dire shieldhead takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the shieldhead moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 24 (4d10 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or fall prone.

action.name: Ram
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit:16 (3d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Dire Rage
trait.description: When the dire sitri cat takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The Sitri cat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Seven Shades of Sitri
entries: A humanoid who touches a Sitri cat must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or become infected with the Seven Shades of Sitri. If a humanoid succeeds on the saving throw, they're immune to the disease for 24 hours. Carnal urges overwhelm an infected humanoid. When the infected interacts with another non-hostile humanoid, the infected becomes charmed by that humanoid until the subject of the infatuation or their friends harm the infected. The infected can repeat the saving throw once every 24 hours. Current infatuations end when one of these saves succeeds. The disease ends for the infected when they have succeeded on five saving throws.

action.name: Claws
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit:5 (1d4 + 3) and Seven Shades of Sitri.

trait.name: Dire Rage
trait.description: When the dire sloth galloper takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Speed Burst
entries: Provided it isn't moving over difficult terrain, the sloth galloper can use a bonus action to take the Dash action.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The sloth galloper makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit:13 (3d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Dire Rage
trait.description: When the dire snapjaw takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: Snapjaw can hold its breath for 30 minutes.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Snapjaw makes three attacks: two with its bite and one with its tail.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit:30 (4d12 + 6) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 17). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and Snapjaw can't bite another target.

action.name: Tail
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target not grappled by Snapjaw. Hit:21 (3d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 17 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

trait.name: Dire Rage
trait.description: When the dire spotted lion takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The lion has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the lion's allies is within 5 feet of the target and the ally doesn't have the incapacitated condition.

action.name: Rend
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit:22 (3d10 + 7) piercing damage. If the lion moved at least 20 feet straight toward the target immediately before the hit, the target must succeed on a DC 18 Strength saving throw or have the prone condition. If the target has the prone condition, the lion can make another Rend attack against it as a bonus action.

trait.name: Dire Rage
trait.description: When the dire titanothere takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Beast of Burden
entries: The titanothere is considered to be one size larger for the purpose of determining its carrying capacity.

action.name: Stomp
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit:28 (4d10 + 8) bludgeoning damage. If the titanothere moved at least 20 feet straight toward the target immediately before the hit, the target takes an extra 38 (5d12 + 8) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 19 Strength saving throw or have the prone condition if it is a creature.

trait.name: Dire Rage
trait.description: When the dire brown scavver takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Instinctive Hibernation
entries: Whenever the scavver takes cold damage, if it has fewer than 10 hit points remaining it falls asleep for the next minute.

trait.name: Electrosensitive
entries: If the scavver takes any lightning damage, it has disadvantage on Dexterity saving throws until the beginning of its next turn.

trait.name: Swallowing Reflex
entries: A creature may throw an object into the scavver's mouth with a successful improvised attack roll against the scavver's AC. If it does, the scavver swallows the object, counting as a willing creature for any effects of the swallowed object.

action.name: Gulp
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (3d8 + 5) piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw or be swallowed by the scavver (escape DC 16).

While swallowed, a creature is blinded and restrained, has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the scavver, and takes 35 (5d12 + 5) poison damage at the start of each of the scavver's turns.

action.name: Broadside Slam
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 20 (3d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

reaction.name: Vent Gullet
entries: As a reaction when a creature it has swallowed escapes, the scavver vents the poisonous gas from its gullet. Each creature within 5 feet of it must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or take 29 (4d12 + 5) poison damage, or half as much on a success.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (3d6 + 3) piercing damage.

trait.name: Dire Rage
trait.description: When the dire giant space hamster takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Dire Rage
trait.description: When the dire jammer leech takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Matched Materials
entries: A leech that has been attached to a surface for at least 24 hours is indistinguishable from the surface around it to creatures more than 30 feet away.

trait.name: Spelljammer Overload
entries: If the leech is reduced to 0 hit points while attached to a ship with a spelljamming helm, a creature attached to that helm must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or be stunned for 1 minute.

action.name: Spiked Tentacle
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (3d8 + 1) piercing damage.

action.name: Latch
entries: The leech attaches itself to a ship's hull in its space, dealing 13 (3d8 + 1) piercing damage to the ship (ignoring the ship's damage threshold). This damage can't be repaired until the leech is scraped off the hull. As an action, an adjacent creature can attempt a DC 11 Strength check to try to scrape it off.

reaction.name: Spell Skimmer
entries: As a reaction when a vessel it is attached to accelerates to cruising speed, the leech forces the spelljammer to succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or lose its lowest level unexpended spell slot.

reaction.name: Magical Discharge (1/Day)
entries: When it takes damage, the leech can discharge a bolt of stolen magical energy. One creature the leech can see within 30 feet must succeed on a DC 11 Dexterity saving throw or take 21 (4d10 + 1) force damage for each spell level absorbed with the leech's Spell Skimmer ability in the last day.

trait.name: Dire Rage
trait.description: When the dire night scavver takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Instinctive Hibernation
entries: Whenever the scavver takes cold damage, if it has fewer than 10 hit points remaining it falls asleep for the next minute.

trait.name: Electrosensitive
entries: If the scavver takes any lightning damage, it has disadvantage on Dexterity saving throws until the beginning of its next turn.

trait.name: Obdurate
entries: If forced to move from a space, the night scavver always returns to the space it was moved from on its following turn, or to the nearest unoccupied space it can reach.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 36 (5d12 + 6) piercing damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 17). This attack is made at advantage against a creature that is missing any of its hit points.

action.name: Broadside Slam
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 31 (5d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage and the target is pushed 5 ft. away.
If the target is a ship, each creature on board must succeed on a DC 17 Strength saving throw or fall prone.

reaction.name: Push Back
entries: As a reaction when a creature fails at an attempt to shove the scavver, the scavver forces the creature to succeed on a DC 17 Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 10 feet away.

trait.name: Dire Rage
trait.description: When the dire space eel takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Unusual Nature
entries: The eel doesn't require air.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: If it isn't attached to a creature, the eel makes one Bite attack and one Tail Spine attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage, and the eel attaches to the target. While attached, the eel can't make Bite attacks. Instead, the target takes 12 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage at the start of each of the eel's turns. The eel can detach itself as a bonus action. A creature, including the target, can use its action to detach the eel.

action.name: Tail Spine
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute. Until this poison ends, the target is paralyzed. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

trait.name: Dire Rage
trait.description: When the dire space guppy takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Air Envelope
entries: If it has at least 1 hit point, the guppy can generate an air envelope around itself when in a vacuum. This air envelope can sustain the guppy and one other Tiny creature in its space indefinitely.

trait.name: Flyby
entries: The guppy doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

action.name: Tail Slap
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3).

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d4 + 5).

action.name: Go for the Eyes (Recharge 6)
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 5) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or be blinded until the start of the hamster's next turn.

bonus.name: Escape
entries: The hamster takes the Dash or Disengage action.

trait.name: Dire Rage
trait.description: When the dire space hamster takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Dire Rage
trait.description: When the dire space mollymawk takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Flyby
entries: The mollymawk doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: The mollymawk can hold its breath for 15 minutes.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (2d6 + 2) piercing damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d8 + 2) piercing damage.

trait.name: Dire Rage
trait.description: When the dire space swine takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Dire Rage
trait.description: When the dire void scavver takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Instinctive Hibernation
entries: Whenever the scavver takes cold damage, if it has fewer than 10 hit points remaining it falls asleep for the next minute.

trait.name: Electrosensitive
entries: If the scavver takes any lightning damage, it has disadvantage on Dexterity saving throws until the beginning of its next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The scavver makes two attacks with its Broadside Slam and uses its Fear Gaze, if available.

action.name: Swallowing Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 56 (7d12 + 7) piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 19 Dexterity saving throw or be swallowed by the scavver (escape DC 19).

While swallowed, a creature is blinded and restrained, has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the scavver, and takes 35 (4d12 + 7) acid damage at the start of each of the scavver's turns.

action.name: Broadside Slam
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 32 (5d10 + 7) bludgeoning damage and the target is pushed 10 ft. away.
If the target is a ship, each creature on board must succeed on a DC 19 Strength saving throw or be pushed 10 feet away and fall prone.

action.name: Fear Gaze (Recharge 4-6)
entries: One creature within 60 feet the scavver can see must succeed on a DC 19 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of the scavver's next turn.

reaction.name: Hypercompetitive
entries: If the void scavver is within 10 feet of a hostile creature and another scavver ends its movement within 10 ft. of the void scavver, the void scavver must use its reaction to make a broadside slame attack against it.

trait.name: Dire Rage
trait.description: When the dire grey scavver takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Instinctive Hibernation
entries: Whenever the scavver takes cold damage, if it has fewer than 10 hit points remaining it falls asleep for the next minute.

trait.name: Electrosensitive
entries: If the scavver takes any lightning damage, it has disadvantage on Dexterity saving throws until the beginning of its next turn.

trait.name: Poor Memory
entries: The scavver cannot clearly recollect events that happened more than 6 seconds ago

action.name: Frenzied Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d10 + 4) piercing damage. This attack is made at advantage against a creature that is missing any of its hit points.

reaction.name: Regroup
entries: As a reaction when it is reduced below 10 hit points, the scavver moves up to its speed away from the source of the damage without provoking attacks of opportunity.
